descriptor.name: Vitamin C Face Serum with Hyaluronic acid - Hydrates, Brightens & Firms up Skin By Body Cupid - 30 ml

descriptor.name: Hemp Hair Oil For Dry, Damaged and Chemically Treated Hair - 150ml 150 ML(Pump)
descriptor.short_desc: benefitsrestore life to dry damaged and brittle hair with hemp hair oil.this oil helps nourish hair and makes it resilient, smooth and manageable.hemp hair oil is a non-sticky-non-greasy, lightweight hair oil that is easily absorbed.    all natural, real ingredients hemp seed oilthe key nourishing ingredient, it is rich in omega 3, 6 and other fatty acids that are deeply nourishing.argan oilrich in vitamin e and fatty acids, it conditions and softens rough strands and helps tame frizz.vitamin ean essential vitamin, it is moisturising and helps nourish the scalp and protect the hair.    how to usestep 1take a generous amount of hemp hair oil in your palm.step 2gently massage into your scalp and roots, then work across the length of your hair.step 3leave in for at least half an hour before shampooing. leave in overnight for best results.

descriptor.short_desc: wow skin science green tea & tea tree anti-dandruff shampoo:the shampoo helps to gently removes dry flakes from the scalp and keep dandruff in check. it helps to refresh greasy hair and keep oily scalp under control. the shampoo helps to prevent dryness and soothe irritated scalp. it helps to add clean, healthy shine to hair. delivers the purifying goodness of green tea, rich in catechins and polyphenols that fight dryness and hair fall. tea tree oil, contains antioxidants that protect the scalp, keep the roots clean and improve blood circulation to the scalp. rosebay in the shampoo has clarifying properties that soothe scalp irritations and reduces the appearance of dandruff; sweet almond oil, rich in efa and vitamin e that moisturize and protect hair and scalp.wow skin science green tea & tea tree anti-dandruff conditioner:protect your hair from flakes; restore shine and softness with wow skin science green tea & tea tree anti-dandruff conditioner. the hair conditioner helps to keep dandruff in check and prevents flakes from sticking to strands. it keeps oily scalp under control and helps to refresh greasy hair. natural oils support in moisturizing hair and enhance its texture and add softness. enhances hair strength and volume for dull, limp hair. it helps to add clean, healthy shine to hair.wow skin science green tea foaming face wash with built-in face brush:help revive dull, tired skin with wow skin science green tea foaming face wash with built in face brush. delivers the goodness of green tea extract, aloe vera extract, pro-vitamin b5 and vitamin e. the face wash packed with skin-protecting antioxidants supports in fighting signs of aging like fine lines, age spots and dryness. it washes away dirt and pollutants without drying your skin. it leaves the skin hydrated and soft as the actives help to replenish lost moisture to your skin. the face wash also helps to balance skin and give you more even-toned complexion.wow skin science green tea face moisturizer:refresh, hydrate and keep your greasy, acne-prone skin soft with wow skin science green tea oil-free face moisturizer. the moisturizer helps to moisturize oily, acne-prone skin without clogging pores; balance excess sebum on skin and reduce redness and acne-flareups. the actives in the moisturizer helps to repair skin damage; maintain collagen levels and improve skin elasticity and minimize the appearance of fine lines. it hydrates and improves texture and helps to restore skin radiance.wow skin science green tea hand & nail cream:       frequent hand washing and sanitizing can dry your hands leading to roughness which needs a soothing and hydrating care. restore your dry, rough hands with wow skin science green tea hand & nail cream. a reviving cream to help moisturize and repair rough hands, weak nails and dry cuticles. the cream has a non-greasy texture and delivers anytime hydration for your hands. infused with green tea extract, tucuma butter, shea butter and vitamin e that help to hydrate dry, rough hands, soften dry cuticles and improve firmness of the skin. it leaves the your hands feeling soft, supple and velvety smooth. it hydrates and softens brittle nails and cuticles protecting nails from breakage. keeps your hands feeling and smelling fresh and clean always.

descriptor.name: APRICOT/ALUBHUKAR/KHUBANI 100g

descriptor.name: WALLNUTS/AKROT MAGZ 100g
descriptor.short_desc: a walnut is the nut of any tree of the genus juglans, particularly the persian or english walnut, juglans regia. a walnut is the edible seed of a drupe, and thus not a true botanical nut. it is commonly consumed as a nut. after full ripening for its edible seed when the shell has been discarded, it is used as a garnish or a snack. rich in protein, fats, carbohydrates and fiber.

descriptor.name: PUMPKIN SEEDS/KADDU BEEJ/KUMBALKAI BEEJA 100g
descriptor.short_desc: a pumpkin seed, also known in north america as a pepita, is the edible seed of a pumpkin. the seeds are typically flat and asymmetrically oval, have a white outer husk, and are light green in color after the husk is removed. the seeds are nutrient- and calorie-rich, with especially high content of fat, protein, dietary fiber, and numerous micronutrients. pumpkin seed most commonly refers to the roasted end product used as a snack.

descriptor.name: HERBAL BATHING POWDER
descriptor.short_desc:
how to use-this pack contains 5 types of powders, mix all these with 1 kg of chicpea(besan/gram flour). take 2-3 tbsp of the mixed powder in plain water, you can add milk(for dry skin) also and mix properly, scrub it on the entire body & face, wash it after 5-10 min.
benifits- very useful for glowing and soft skin.  
contents- ambi haldi (turmeric)-100g, orange peel powder-100g, kachoor powder-100g, chiksa-100g & rose petals-100g.

descriptor.name: boAt Rockerz 600 KKR Edition
descriptor.short_desc: rockerz 600 kkr editionboat rockerz 600 kkr is an on-ear wireless headphone that has been ergonomically designed to meet the needs of music lovers. its unrivalled design and faux leather ear cushions offer substance with style & utmost comfort. the headphones come equipped with bluetooth v4.1 for instant wireless connectivity. the user can utilize the headset via dual connectivity in the form of bluetooth as well as aux. its powerful 300mah battery provides a playtime of up to 8 hours for an extended audio bliss. its 40mm dynamic drivers help supply superior musical experience to the user with immersive sound. with rockerz 600 kkr, it’s time to rule!captivating hd soundwith 40mm dynamic drivers and hd sound, feel every match moment come alive like never before.up to 8h nonstop playbackthe powerful 300mah battery capacity offers a superior playback time of up to 8 hours uninterrupted, so nothing breaks the flow of your match!faux leather headphones with soft earcupsergonomically designed with foldable ear cups and comfy & plush faux leather ear cushions to provide the most relaxing match watching experience. specificationsconnect & playheadphone typeon-eardriver typemoving coil driverdriver size40 mmimpedance32ωsensitivity (db)110db±3dbfrequency response20hz-20khzbattery capacity (mah)300 mahplayback time8 hourscharging time3 hoursstandby time100 hoursbluetooth versionv4.1compatibilityall bluetooth devicesbluetooth range10mcountry of originchina smooth integrated controlequipped with easy access integrated controls and built-in mic for a seamless user experience and a complete control over playback and calls.  faqq. can we accept calls on it? is it good for calls, meetings and work from home?yes, a single press on the multi-function button allows the user to easily accept and reject calls. rockerz 600 kkr edition are designed for great clarity and comfort during meetings and important calls.q. does it have a dedicated microphone?yes, rockerz 600 kkr edition earphones have a dedicated mic perfect for calls and recording.q. can i charge my headphones with a mobile charger?yes, rockerz 600 kkr edition wireless headphones can be charged with a mobile charger.q. how long does it take to charge? does it support fast charging?rockerz 600 kkr edition takes 3h to charge. it does not support fast charging.q. can we use it while putting the earphones on charge?yes, one can use the device while charging it at the same time.q. what bluetooth version does rockerz 600 kkr edition support?rockerz 600 kkr edition wireless bluetooth earphones supports bluetooth v4.1.q. what can i do with the inline buttons?you can change tracks, adjust volume, take and reject calls, redial, and access voice assistant with the inline buttons. for further information, please refer to the user manual.q. does it have aux support?yes, rockerz 600 kkr edition also has aux support when bluetooth is not in use.q. how can i enable google and siri?double tap to connect with google & siri and activate the voice assistant. please refer to the manual for further instructions.q. is there a warranty for the product? how do i claim warranty?yes, all of our true wireless earbuds come with a 1 year warranty. to register your device, visit https://support.boat-lifestyle.com/.download manual

descriptor.short_desc: airdopes atom 81 true wireless earbuds with enx™ technologyelevate your listening with the electric sound of airdopes atom 81. equipped with enx™ technology, beast™ mode and 13mm drivers, it’s built to transform how you listen to your music. the microphone isolates your voice and cuts out background sound to enable the best calling experience and beast™ mode delivers 55ms low latency audio for minimum audio lag. keep the music flowing with 50 hours playback and asap charge that recharges the battery in a blink. love what you hear with airdopes atom 81!no room for disturbancesenx™ technology suppresses background noise while on calls and beast™ mode delivers 55ms low latency audio which ensures no audio lag whatsoever.balance is the keyequipped with 13mm drivers, airdopes atom 81 delivers the perfect balance of powerful bass and a high treble for a never-heard-before audio experience.all day longcarry your music everywhere with a massive battery that can last up to 50 hours on a single charge. asap™ technology pumps another 60 mins of juice within only 5 mins of charge.seamless and instantwith bluetooth 5.3, airdopes atom 81 allows seamless connectivity and iwp™ technology instantly pairs with your device the moment the lid comes off.music is meant for experiencesairdopes atom 81  comes with ipx5 water resistance – so you can take your music to beaches, mountains or whatever your happy place is.specificationsconnect & playbluetooth versionv5.3ipx ratingipx5music playtimeup to 50 hoursasap chargeyesbeast modeyescharging time2 pause and play tracks?single tap the capacitive touch control on either earbud to play a song or to pause one. airdopes atom 81 comes with a host of intuitive features that allow one to seamlessly control music. please refer to the instruction manual to learn about the different ways one can take advantage of its features.q. can we accept calls on boat airdopes atom 81yes, airdopes atom 81 comes with beast mode and enx™ noise cancellation technology that suppresses background noise when speaking into the mic and low latency audio which allows for an unrivalled calling and media experience.q. can i use any adapter to charge my device?yes, you can use any type-c compatible adapter to charge your airdopes atom 81 charging case.q. are airdopes atom 81 waterproof and sweat resistant?yes, airdopes atom 81 is ipx5 water and sweat resistant. you can use it for your workouts or carry them along on long trips.q. how long does boat airdopes atom 81 last on a single charge?airdopes atom 81 wireless earbuds offer a total battery backup of up to 50 hours. it also supports asap fast charge that yields a playtime of 120 mins with only 5 minutes of charging time.q. can i charge my earphones with a mobile charger?yes, airdopes atom 81 supports type-c charging. if your mobile charger comes with type-c charging support then you can easily use the same to charge your device.q. is it good for longer gym workouts and sweating over 2+ hours?yes, airdopes atom 81 comes with ipx5 water resistance along with a huge battery capacity making it perfect for gym workouts that last more than 2 hours.q. can i charge my earphones while the case is being charged?yes, one can simultaneously charge the carrying case and the bluetooth earbuds at the same time.q. what is the use of the charging case?the charging case is ergonomically designed to be portable. you can carry your in-ear earbuds around while they are being charged in the case.q. how can i connect with google and siri?yes, airdopes atom 81 comes with full support for google voice assistant and apple siri.q. is there a warranty for the product? how do i claim warranty?yes, all of our true wireless earphones come with a 1 year warranty. to register your device, visit https://support.boat-lifestyle.com/.     download manual

descriptor.name: boAt Airdopes 115 | Earbuds with 13mm drivers, BEAST™ Mode for Gamers, ENx™ Technology Black
descriptor.short_desc: airdopes 115 - best wireless bluetooth earbudspro gamer? we got you. a do-it-all hustler? even better! airdopes 115 is the perfect choice for both worlds. its 13mm drivers will make you experience a thumping bass and drown you in the unbeatable boat signature sound. get the gamer to win matches with minimum lag powered by beast™ mode. call disturbance will never be an issue with enx™ technology that makes calls crystal clear for you. so, pick from its dynamic colours & vibe limitless with its 24hrs playback.13mm drivers - boat immersive audiowith 13mm drivers, boat immersive audio shines through even in loud and noisy surroundings.beast™ modeunwanted lag? you and your games will always be in sync with the beast™ mode powered airdopes 115 which ensures low latency. enx™ techthe enx™ technology suppresses ambient noise and makes conversations as clear as in person. airdopes 115 ensures you’re heard every time. up to 24 hrs total playbackfrom your early morning sweat session to the drive back home, airdopes 115 comes with a total backup of 24 hours that lasts you through the day. the 3x case fuel matches the pace of your life. iwp™️ technologythe insta wake n’ pair technology lets you connect and disconnect your airdopes in a jiffy. simply open the lid to wake them up and close it to disconnect. ipx4 sweat resistanceipx4 sweat resistance prevents your airdopes from any damage that sweat or everyday spills or splashes could lead to. it’s no less than perfect for your outdoor workout. specificationsconnect & playheadphone typetws earbudsdriver size13mmbluetooth versionv5.2bluetooth range10mbattery capacity300mah case, 35mah*2 earbudsplaying timeup to 24 hours with case (at 60% volume)charging time30 mins earbuds and 1.5 hours casecharging interfaceusb type cwater resistanceipx4country of originchina four stylish coloursairdopes 115 comes in 4 exciting colours - white siberia, raging red, furious blue, and active black. take your pick and rock it your way, every day. asap™ chargein a hurry? you will never be late. now put it on charge for 10 minutes and play them for up to 180 minutes.  faqsq. how can we pause and play tracks?single tap the capacitive touch control on either earbud to play a song or to pause one. airdopes 115 comes with a host of intuitive features that allows one to seamlessly control music. please refer to the instruction manual to learn about the different ways one can take advantage of its features.q. can we accept calls on boat airdopes 115?yes, a single press on the multi-function airdopes 115 waterproof and sweat resistant?yes, airdopes 115 is ipx4 water resistant. you can use it for your workouts or carry them along on long trips.q. how long does boat airdopes 115 last on a morning sweat session to the drive back home, airdopes 115 comes with a total backup of 24 hours that lasts you through the day. the 3x case fuel matches the pace of your life. iwp™️ technologythe insta wake n’ pair technology lets you connect and disconnect your airdopes in a jiffy. simply open the lid to wake them up and close it to disconnect. ipx4 sweat resistanceipx4 sweat resistance prevents your airdopes from any damage that sweat or everyday spills or splashes could lead to. it’s no less than perfect for your outdoor workout. specificationsconnect & playheadphone typetws earbudsdriver size13mmbluetooth versionv5.2bluetooth range10mbattery capacity300mah case, 35mah*2 earbudsplaying timeup to 24 hours with case (at 60% volume)charging time30 mins earbuds and 1.5 hours casecharging interfaceusb type cwater resistanceipx4country of originchina four stylish coloursairdopes 115 comes in 4 exciting colours - white siberia, raging red, furious blue, and active black. take your pick and rock it your way, every day. asap™ chargein a hurry? you will never be late. now put it on charge for 10 minutes and play them for up to 180 minutes.  faqsq. how can we pause and play tracks?single tap the capacitive touch control on either earbud to play a song or to pause one. airdopes 115 comes with a host of intuitive features that allows one to seamlessly control music. please refer to the instruction manual to learn about the different ways one can take advantage of its features.q. can we accept calls on boat airdopes 115?yes, a single press on the multi-function button allows the user to easily accept and reject calls.q. can i use any adapter to charge my device?yes, you can use any type-c compatible adapter to charge your airdopes 115 charging case.q. are airdopes 115 waterproof and sweat resistant?yes, airdopes 115 is ipx4 water resistant. you can use it for your workouts or carry them along on long trips.q. how long does boat airdopes 115 last on a single charge?airdopes 115 wireless earbuds offer battery backup of up to 24 hours on a single charge.q. does it support fast charging?yes, airdopes 115 supports asap fast charging technology. 10 minutes of charge yields a playtime of up to 180 minutes.q. can i charge my earphones with a mobile charger?yes, airdopes 115 supports type-c charging. if your mobile charger comes with type-c charging support then you can easily use the same to charge your device.q. is it good for longer gym workouts and sweating over 2+ hours?yes, airdopes 115 comes with ipx4 water resistance along with a huge battery capacity making it perfect for gym workouts that last more than 2 hours.q. can i charge my earphones while the case is being charged?yes, one can simultaneously charge the carrying case and the bluetooth earbuds at the same time.q. what is the use of the charging case?the charging case is ergonomically designed to be portable and also has an indicator allowing one to easily tell the battery percentage. you can carry your in-ear earbuds around while they’re being charged in the case.q. what bluetooth version do boat airdopes 115 support?airdopes 115 earbuds come with bluetooth v5.2 technology. these in-ear earbuds also support all previous versions of bluetooth.q. are they compatible with iphones and android phones?yes, airdopes 115 are fully compatible with iphones and android devices.q. how can i connect with google and siri?double tap to connect with google & siri and activate the voice assistant. please refer to the manual for further instructions.q. is there a warranty for the product? how do i claim warranty?yes, all of our true wireless earbuds come with a 1 year warranty. to register your device, visit https://support.boat-lifestyle.com/.    download descriptor.name: Rockerz 450 | Over Ear Bluetooth Headphones with Upto 15 Hours Playback, Adaptive Headband, 40mm Dynamic Driver, 300 mah Battery Beige
descriptor.short_desc: rockerz 450 over ear bluetooth headphonesset your mind ablaze with boat rockerz 450 — our slick headphones that offer immersive sound quality and add luxury to your sound. propelled by crystal clear 40mm dynamic drivers, slip into an alternate hd immersive audio reality. the soft cornered matte black finish allows for a comfortable fit, propagated by plush foam in adaptive and adjustable design. choose your mode, go wireless with bluetooth v4.2 or connect an aux wire that doesn’t cause any drain on the 300mah rechargeable lithium battery.hd immersive audiothat comes via the 40mm premium drivers, so just slip into the sound and slip into the comfort and let your visions crystallize with the wild streak of your rhythm.up to 15 hours of audio excellencethat won’t stop until you do, with a standby time of 300 to 400 hours powered by a rechargeable 300mah battery and play it your way.adaptive ear cups and headbandbased around a smooth comfort fit design coated with a sleek matte finish and look sharp and stay sharp, the boat headway. specificationsconnect & playheadphone typeon-eardriver typemoving coil driverdriver size40 mmimpedance32ωsensitivity (db)108db±3dbfrequency response20hz-20khzbattery capacity (mah)300 mahplayback time15 hourscharging time3 hoursstandby time400 hoursbluetooth versionv4.2country of originchinacompatibilityall bluetooth devicesbluetooth range10m easy operational controlsso that you can control your music with no hiccups, communicate seamlessly using the in-build mic and so that you can always stay in the zone.  faqsq. can we accept calls on it? is it good for calls, meetings and work from home?yes, a single press on the multi-function button allows the user to easily accept and reject calls. rockerz 450 are designed for great clarity and comfort during meetings and important calls.q. can we adjust the length of the wire?no, the length of the wire cannot be adjusted.q. does it have a dedicated microphone?yes, rockerz 450 headphones has a dedicated mic perfect for calls and recording.q. can i charge my headphones with a mobile charger?yes, rockerz 450 wireless headphones can be charged with a mobile charger.q. how long does it take to charge? does it support fast charging?rockerz 450 takes 3h to charge. it does not support fast charging.q. can we use it while putting the headphones on charge?yes, one can use the device while charging it at the same time.q. what bluetooth version does rockerz 450 support?rockerz 450 wireless bluetooth headphones supports bluetooth v4.2.q. what can i do with the inline buttons?you can change tracks, adjust volume, take and reject calls, redial, and access voice assistant with the inline buttons. for further information, please refer to the user manual.q. does it have aux support?yes, rockerz 450 also has aux support when bluetooth is not in use.q. how can i enable google and siri?double tap to connect with google & siri and activate the voice assistant. please refer to the manual for further instructions.q. is there a warranty for the product? how do i claim warranty?yes, all of our wireless earphones & headphones come with a 1 year warranty. to register your device, visit https://support.boat-lifestyle.com/.    download manual

time of 12 hours along with the charging case.q. what is the battery capacity of boat airdopes ‌131‌ punjab kings ‌‌edition‌ and how long does it take to charge?the battery capacity of boat airdopes ‌131‌ punjab kings ‌‌edition‌ is 40mah for each earbud and the charging case has a battery capacity of 650mah. the earbuds take around 1.5h to fully charge.q. does it support fast charging?no, boat airdopes ‌131‌ punjab kings ‌‌edition‌ supports only standard charging.q. can i charge my earphones with a mobile charger?yes, boat airdopes ‌131‌ punjab kings ‌‌edition‌ supports type-c charging. if your mobile charger comes with type-c charging support then you can easily charge your device using your mobile charger.q. is it good for longer gym workouts and sweating over 2+ hours?yes, boat airdopes ‌131‌ punjab kings ‌‌edition‌ comes with ipx7 dust and water resistance along with a huge battery capacity making it perfect for gym workouts that last more than 2 hours.q. can i charge my earphones while the case is being charged?yes, one can simultaneously charge the carrying case and the bluetooth earbuds at the same time.q. what is the use of the charging case? how long does it take the charging case to charge?the charging case is ergonomically designed to be portable and lightweight. you can carry your in-ear earbuds around while they’re being charged in the case. the charging case takes around 1.5-2 hours to charge.q. what bluetooth version do boat airdopes ‌131‌ punjab kings ‌‌edition‌ support?boat airdopes ‌131‌ punjab kings ‌‌edition‌ earbuds come with bluetooth v5.0 technology. these in ear earbuds also support all previous versions of bluetooth.q. are they compatible with iphones and android phones?yes, boat airdopes ‌131‌ punjab kings ‌‌edition‌ are fully compatible with iphones and android devices.q. how can i connect with google and siri?yes, you can double tap to connect with google & siri and activate the voice assistant. device, visit https://support.boat-lifestyle.com/.    download manual

descriptor.name: boAt Airdopes 621 | TWS Earbuds with 6mm Driver, 150H Mountainous Playback with Case, IWP technology™, ASAP Charge Technology Active Black
descriptor.short_desc: boat airdopes 621 - best wireless earbudsexperience sound blasting good times with the unbeatable boat signature sound. packed with a mountainous playback time of 150 hours, airdopes 621 bluetooth earbuds keeps you going all day long. experience connected life with boat iwp technology™ that seamlessly pairs the airdopes with your device. powered by asap charge technology that lets you flip through your entire playlist smoothly with just a few minutes of charging. with ipx7 stay shielded from sweat, water and dust and kill that workout session or go outdoors worriless!lose yourself in musicexperience the unbeatable boat signature sound that shines through no matter what you are playing! with a thumping bass that transports you to another world, feel music like never before.150h mountainous playback with casedance to the tune of your moods while keeping your charging worries at bay! with a powerpack mountainous performance of upto 150 hours, stay plugged all day and stop at nothing.charge 5 mins, enjoy for 60 minswith asap charge technology charge your device for just 5 minutes and get a playback of 60 minutes. just 40 minutes to fully charge! specificationsconnect & playheadphone typetws earbudsipx ratingipx7driver typemoving coildriver size6 mmimpedance16ω+15%frequency20hz-20khzbattery capacity (mah)35mah x 2 + 2600 mah charging caseplayback time5 hours buds, 150 hours casecharging time5-7 hoursstandby time70 hoursbluetooth versionv5.0compatibilityall bluetooth devicesbluetooth range10mcountry of originchina stop at nothingwith ipx7 sweat, water and dust resistance, ace your workouts and runs even on rainy days. go nail that workout and follow your adventures, and let nothing hold you back!  faqq. how can we pause and play tracks?single tap the capacitive touch control on either earbud to play a song or to pause one. airdopes 621 comes with a host of intuitive features that allows one to seamlessly control music. please refer to the instruction manual to learn about the different ways one can take advantage of its features.q. can we accept calls on boat airdopes 621?yes, a single press on the multi-function button allows the user to easily accept and reject calls.q. can i use any adapter to charge my device?yes, you can use any adapter to charge your airdopes 621 charging case.q. are airdopes 621 waterproof and sweat resistant?yes, airdopes 621 is ipx7 dust and water resistant. you can use it for your workouts or carry them along on long trips.q. how long does boat airdopes 621 last on a single charge?airdopes 621 wireless earbuds offer battery backup of up to 5.5 hours on a single charge. they also give a total playback time of 150 hours along with the charging case.q. does it support fast charging?yes, airdopes 621 supports type-c charging. if your mobile charger comes with type-c charging support then you can easily use the same to charge your device.q. is it good for longer gym workouts and sweating over 2+ hours?yes, airdopes 621 comes with ipx7 dust and water resistance along with a huge battery capacity making it perfect for gym workouts that last more than 2 hours.q. can i charge my earphones while the case is being charged?yes, one can simultaneously charge the carrying case and the bluetooth earbuds at the same time.q. what is the use of the charging case?the charging case is ergonomically designed to be portable and also has a digital indicator allowing one to easily tell the battery percentage. you can carry your in-ear earbuds around while they’re being charged in the case.q. what bluetooth version do boat airdopes 621 support?airdopes 621 earbuds come with bluetooth v5.0 technology. these in ear earbuds also support all previous versions of bluetooth.q. are they compatible with iphones and android phones?yes, airdopes 621 are fully compatible with iphones and android devices.q. how do i reboot/restart my earbuds?in order to reboot your device, turn off bluetooth on your mobile device, place your earbuds in the case, close the lid, and wait for 10 seconds.q. how do i factory reset my earbud?in order to factory reset your airdopes 621- go to the bluetooth settings on your mobile device, find your airdopes 621 and select 'forget'.on your airdopes 621,step 1: place both the earbuds back inside the charging case in correct orientation.step 2: long press the ctc on both earbuds inside the case for up to 10 seconds to do factory reset, which is indicated by the flashing of green led three times.step 3: shut the lid of the charging case, re-open it again and perform a fresh connection.please refer to the manual for further assistance.q. how can i connect with google and siri?double tap to connect with google & siri and activate the voice assistant. please refer to the manual for further instructions.q. is there a warranty for the product? how do i claim warranty?yes, all of our true wireless earbuds come with a 1 year warranty. to register your device, visit https://support.boat-lifestyle.com/.  download manual

descriptor.name: boAt BassHeads 225 Carrying Case Green
descriptor.short_desc: boat bassheads 225 carrying caseboat bassheads 225 carrying case polished metal earphones are designed to give you an experience which no other brand can match. it has an incredible sonic clarity with "super extra bass". it is not a plastic earphone - it is polished metal. with tangle free flat cables, you are expected to be hassle free.super extra bassboat bassheads 225 boasts of a powerful 10 mm drivers for hdsound while the super extra bass lets you enjoy your favorite songs with greater clarity making the process of listening to music a fulfilling one. with a total harmonic distortion of 0.3 %, wide frequency range of 20 hz to 20 khz, speaker resistance of 16 ohm & sensitivity range of 98 db +/- 3dbthat minimizes any distortion of sound quality, you are guaranteed a fun-filled auditory experience.polished metalavailable in attractive colours, the boat bassheads 225 wired earphones with mic black weighs 50 gm and thus is easily portable. the material used to manufacture these earphones is polished metal that ensures its longevity. the tangle-free cable ensures that you do not face any problems while using these earphones. these earphones have gold-plated angled 3.5 mm plug that is sure to draw your attention.passive noise cancellationpassive noise cancellation feature enables users to enjoy listening to your music in a chaotic and noisy environment - this feature also enables users to receive calls on-the-go. specificationsconnect & playheadphone typein-earsuper extra bassyesdriver size10 mmimpedance16ωsensitivity (db)92db ±3dbfrequency response20hz-20khznoise isolationpassivemicrophone yescountry of originchinarated power2mwcompatibilityall 3.5mm jack device carry casethese earphones come with a carrying case along, to protect the device and provide the ultimate user experience.  faqq. can i pause/play & change tracks with the earphones?yes, one can pause/play, change tracks, pick and hang up calls. bassheads 225 carrying case comes with a host of intuitive features that allows one to seamlessly control music. please refer to the instruction manual to learn about the different ways one can take advantage of its features.q. does it have an in-line microphone?yes, bassheads 225 carrying case comes with an in-line microphone. the microphone also features in-built noise isolation technology.q. is it good for meetings and calls?yes, with its in-line microphone and in in-built noise isolation technology, bassheads 225 carrying case is perfect for meetings and working from home.q. does it come with noise cancellation?yes, bassheads 225 carrying case comes with passive noise cancellation.q. what is the length of the cable?the cable is 1200mm long.q. is there a warranty for the product? how do i claim warranty?yes, all of our earphones come with a 1 year warranty. to register your device, visit https://support.boat-lifestyle.com/.

descriptor.name: boAt Rockerz 370 Seagreen
descriptor.short_desc: rockerz 370boat rockerz 370 is a wireless headset that has been ergonomically designed to meet the needs of music lovers. the headphones come equipped with the latest bluetooth v5.0 for instant wireless connectivity. its powerful 300mah battery provides playtime of up to 8 hours for an extended audio bliss. its 40mm dynamic drivers help supply immersive musical experience to the user with hd sound. the user can utilize the headset via dual connectivity in the form of bluetooth and aux.40mm dynamic drivers: immersive sound40mm dynamic drivers supply immersive high definition sound.up to 8 hours of musical blissthe powerful 300mah battery provides up to 8 hours of audio bliss.cosy padded earcupsthe bluetooth headset has padded earcups for a cozy experience. specificationsconnect & playheadphone typeon-eardriver typemoving coil driverdriver size40 mmimpedance32ωsensitivity (db)79db±3dbfrequency response20hz-20khzbattery capacity (mah)300 mahplayback time8 hourscharging time2-3 hoursstandby time180 hoursbluetooth versionv5.0country of originchinacompatibilityall bluetooth devicesbluetooth range10m ergonomically and aesthetically designedthe headphone has been ergonomically and aesthetically designed for a seamless experience.  faqsq. can we accept calls on it? is it good for calls, meetings and work from home?yes, a single press on the multi-function button allows the user to easily accept and reject calls. rockerz 370 are designed for great clarity and comfort during meetings and important calls.q. can we adjust the length of the wire?no, the length of the wire cannot be adjusted.q. does it have a dedicated microphone?yes, rockerz 370 headphones has a dedicated mic perfect for calls and recording.q. can i charge my headphones with a mobile charger?yes, rockerz 370 headphones can be charged with a mobile charger.q. how long does it take to charge? does it support fast charging?rockerz 370 takes around 2-3h to charge. it does not supports fast chargingq. can we use it while putting the headphones on charge?yes, one can use the device while charging it at the same time.q. what bluetooth version does rockerz 370 support?rockerz 370 bluetooth headphones supports bluetooth v5.0.q. what can i do with the inline buttons?you can change tracks, adjust volume, take and reject calls, redial, and access voice assistant with the inline buttons. for further information, please refer to the user manual.q. how can i enable google and siri?double tap to connect with google & siri and activate the voice assistant. please refer to the manual for further instructions.q. is there a warranty for the product? how do i claim warranty?yes, all of our wireless earphones & headphones come with a 1 year warranty. to register your device, visit https://support.boat-lifestyle.com/.    download manual

descriptor.name: boAt Airdopes 402 | Wireless Earbuds with Powerful 10mm Drivers, ENx™️ Technology, ASAP Charge, 30Hours of Playback Time Black
descriptor.short_desc: boat airdopes 402 - best earbuds indiaride through the highest waves of nirvana on your boat airdopes 402 wireless earbuds. drown in your favourite rhythm with its immersive 10mm drivers and boat signature sound. its iwp™️ technology and bluetooth v5.2 offers a seamless and truly wireless listening experience. let nothing come in between you and your music with its massive 30hrs of playback. even if you manage to exhaust your battery, asap charge empowers you with another 60 minutes of playback within 5 minutes of charge. let your thoughts echo clear and loud with enx™️ technology that ensures crystal clear voice delivery. navigating through your music and calls is a breeze with its easy touch controls. do it all and more with airdopes 402true wireless bluetooth v5.2experience seamless wireless connectivity with bluetooth v5.2..go limitless with asap chargenever run out of your rhythm with asap charge that provides 60 minutes of playback within 5 minutes of charge.insta wake' n' pair technologyconnect your device to these dope earbuds effortlessly with insta wake and pair technology. specificationsconnect & playheadphone typein-earipx ratingipx4bluetooth profileshsp, hfp, a2dp and avrcpdriver size10mmhd soundyesfrequency20hz-20khzbattery capacity (mah)3.7v, 45mah×2playback time30 hourscharging time2 hourstandby time180 hoursbluetooth versionv5.2compatibilityall bluetooth devicesbluetooth range10mcountry of originchina immersive 10mm driversfall in love with music yet again with boat signature sound and its powerful 10mm drivers.  faqsq. how can we pause and play tracks?single tap the capacitive touch control on either earbud to play a song or to pause one. airdopes 402 comes with a host of intuitive features that allows one to seamlessly control music. please refer to the instruction manual to learn about the different ways one can take advantage of its features.q. can we accept calls on boat airdopes 402?yes, one can easily accept and reject calls on airdopes 402. a single press on the multi-function button allows the user to easily accept and reject calls.q. can i use any adapter to charge my device?yes, you can use any adapter to charge your airdopes 402 charging case.q. are airdopes 402 waterproof and sweat resistant?yes, airdopes 402 is ipx4 dust and water resistant. you can use it for your workouts or carry them along on long trips.q. how long does airdopes 402 last on a single charge?airdopes 402 wireless earbuds offer battery backup of up to 4 hours on a single charge. they also give a total playback time of 30 hours along with the charging case.q. what is the battery capacity of airdopes 402 and how long does it take to charge?the battery capacity of airdopes 402 is 45mah for each earbud and the charging case has a battery capacity of 450mah. the earbuds take around 1.5-2h to fully charge.q. does it support fast charging?no, airdopes 402 supports only standard charging.q. can i charge my earphones with a mobile charger?yes, airdopes 402 supports type-a charging. if your mobile charger comes with type-a charging support then you can easily charge your device using your mobile charger.q. is it good for longer gym workouts and sweating over 2+ hours?yes, airdopes 402 comes with ipx4 dust and water resistance along with a huge battery capacity making it perfect for gym workouts that last more than 2 hours.q. can i charge my earphones while the case is being charged?yes, one can simultaneously charge the carrying case and the bluetooth earbuds at the same time.q. what is the use of the charging case? how long does it take the charging case to charge?the charging case is ergonomically designed to be portable and lightweight. you can carry your in-ear earbuds around while they’re being charged in the case. the charging case takes around 1.5-2 hours to charge.q. what bluetooth version do boat airdopes 402 support?airdopes 402 earbuds come with bluetooth v5.2 technology. these in ear earbuds also support all previous versions of bluetooth.q. are they compatible with iphones and android phones?yes, airdopes 402 are fully compatible with iphones and android devices.q. how do i reboot/restart my earbuds?in order to reboot your device, turn off bluetooth on your mobile device, place your earbuds in the case, close the lid, and wait for 10 seconds.q. how do i factory reset my earbud?in order to factory reset your airdopes 402- go to the bluetooth settings on your mobile device, find your airdopes 402 and select 'forget'.on your airdopes 402,step 1: place both the earbuds inside the charging case in their correct orientationstep 2: long touch the ctc on both the earbuds for up to 8 seconds to perform the factory reset. once done, it gets indicated by alternate red and blue led flashesstep 3: shut the lid of the case and then reopen it againplease refer to the manual for further assistance.q. how can i connect with google and siri?yes, you can double tap to connect with google & siri and activate the voice assistant. please refer to the manual for further instructions.q. is there a warranty for the product? how do i claim warranty?yes, all of our true wireless earbuds come with a 1 year warranty. to register your device, visit https://support.boat-lifestyle.com/.

easily accept and reject calls on airdopes 402. a single press on the multi-function button allows the user to easily accept and reject calls.q. can i use any adapter to charge my device?yes, you can use any adapter to charge your airdopes 402 charging case.q. are airdopes 402 waterproof and sweat resistant?yes, airdopes 402 is ipx4 dust and water resistant. you can use it for your workouts or carry them along on long trips.q. how long does airdopes 402 last on a single charge?airdopes 402 wireless earbuds offer battery backup of up to 4 hours on a single charge. they also give a total playback time of 30 hours along with the charging case.q. what is the battery capacity of airdopes 402 and how long does it take to charge?the battery capacity of airdopes 402 is 45mah for each earbud and the charging case has a battery capacity of 450mah. the earbuds take around 1.5-2h to fully charge.q. does it support fast charging?no, airdopes 402 supports only standard charging.q. can i charge my earphones with a mobile charger?yes, airdopes 402 supports type-a charging. if your mobile charger comes with type-a charging support then you can easily charge your device using your mobile charger.q. is it good for longer gym workouts and sweating over 2+ hours?yes, airdopes 402 comes with ipx4 dust and water resistance along with a huge battery capacity making it perfect for gym workouts that last more than 2 hours.q. can i charge my earphones while the case is being charged?yes, one can simultaneously charge the carrying case and the bluetooth earbuds at the same time.q. what is the use of the charging case? how long does it take the charging case to charge?the charging case is ergonomically designed to be portable and lightweight. you can carry your in-ear earbuds around while they’re being charged in the case. the charging case takes around 1.5-2 hours to charge.q. what bluetooth version do boat airdopes 402 support?airdopes 402 earbuds come with bluetooth v5.2 technology. these in ear earbuds also support all previous versions of bluetooth.q. are they compatible with iphones and android phones?yes, airdopes 402 are fully compatible with iphones and android devices.q. how do i reboot/restart my earbuds?in order to reboot your device, turn off bluetooth on your mobile device, place your earbuds in the case, close the lid, and wait for 10 seconds.q. how do i factory reset my earbud?in order to factory reset your airdopes 402- go to the bluetooth settings on your mobile device, find your airdopes 402 and select 'forget'.on your airdopes 402,step 1: place both the earbuds inside the charging case in their correct orientationstep 2: long touch the ctc on both the earbuds for up to 8 seconds to perform the factory reset. once done, it gets indicated by alternate red and blue led flashesstep 3: shut the lid of the case and then reopen it againplease refer to the manual for further assistance.q. how can i connect with google and siri?yes, you can double tap to connect with google & siri and activate the voice assistant. please refer to the manual for further instructions.q. is there a warranty for the product? how do i claim warranty?yes, all of our true wireless earbuds come with a 1 year warranty. to register your device, visit https://support.boat-lifestyle.com/.

descriptor.name: boAt TRebel Matrix | Smart Watch for Women with 1.65" Curved AMOLED Display, Smart Activity Tracker, 100+ Cloud Watch Faces
descriptor.short_desc: trebel watch matrix - best smart watch for womenwhen you’re busy winning your dreams, who’s keeping a check on you? ladies, count on watch matrix to count your calories with its smart activity tracker. let your health never hold you back from pursuing your dreams with boat’s smart health ecosystem. make your fitness dreams a reality with customized run plans, and track your goals with crest app gamification. keep your worries at bay and dive into your fitness journey, watch matrix comes with 3 atm dust, splash and sweat resistance. manage your health with spo2, step, heart rate, sleep and period tracker. this smart watch comes with a massive battery backup of 7 days so you #keepplaying. go beyond just fitness and organize your day with all the important notifications on your wrist. get ahead and make a bold statement.get ready for the best of health & technologywatch matrixthe high definition 2.5d curved display offers a complete capacitive immersive experience like never before.1.65 inches displaythe stunning 1.65 inch colour amoled display provides enhanced clarity, crisp image quality and vivid colours that come alive even under the brightest sun. the watch has 'always on display' that won't rest, till you achieve the best.*battery will drain out faster (2 days) than normal (7 days) with its always on display mode.unlock a new level of fitness on your fingertipssmart activity trackerthat records daily calories burnt, steps taken & distances covered.boat's smart health ecosystemcarry your health on your wrist with boat crest appthirsty foradventure?deep dive into fitness with the 3 atm dust, splash & sweat resistance that is rigorously tested for reliability to make matrix a partner you can count on.engineered for you to #keepplayingmanage your healthon the go!spo2(blood oxygen level) trackerheart ratetrackersleeptrackermenstruation cycletrackermusic on the gotune out the noise! with its music control feature, play, pause, switch and navigate your favourite tracks on the go!never run out of motivation with rechargeable battery which lasts upto7 days*battery life is dependent upon usage. battery will last up to 2 days with always on display mode.beyond fitness trackingexpertise you can count on   get calls, messages and other notifications directly on your wrist   customisable alarms, camera and music control make a bold statementwatch matrix comes with over 100+ personalized cloud watch faces for every mood. make watch matrix yours in every way possible. switch up the level of vibration to make notifications a little easy on your wrist, and tweak your display brightness on-the-go. your matrix, your way.

descriptor.name: boAt Stone 358 Black
descriptor.short_desc: stone 358the stone 358 comes with 10w stereo sound that gives excellent stereo sound designed, the right bass and clarity to your music. with its lightweight cylindrical design, feel the comfort as you carry it everywhere. not only that, these wireless speakers are further protected by ipx7 dust and water resistance rating to give you the ultimate peace of mind. with its 2200mah battery capacity, power yourself through 12 hours of immersive listening and be the life of every party! if that isn’t enough, add a second speaker with our tws technology and enjoy sound, twice as powerful! all of that with multiple eq and connectivity modes, including bluetooth v5.0, tf card & aux compatible with both android and ios.kicks in the perfect bass10w stereo sound gives the right bass and clarity to your music. it delivers excellent stereo sound designed by acoustic experts for a complete immersive listening experienceup to 12h nonstop playtimewith a battery capacity of 2200mah, get non-stop entertainment, and power yourself through 12 hours of immersive listening. be the life of every party!ipx7 splash & water resistancecarry your speakers anywhere with an ipx7 splash & water shield leaving behind the tension of water ruining your speakers and your vibe! specificationsconnect & playspeaker typemonoipx ratingipx7driver typefull range driverdriver size52 mmnumber of drivers1frequency response70hz-70khzimpedance4ωwireless technology typebluetoothbluetooth version v5.0 + edrbluetooth range 10mbattery capacity2200 mahrated power10wplaying faqq. is it water resistant?stone 358 comes with ipx7 dust and water resistance.q. can we connect it via aux?yes, stone 358 bluetooth speakers can also be connected via aux cable if bluetooth is not available.q. do we get a charger along with the speaker?no, stone 358 does not come with a charger in the box.q. does it have an in-built mic for hands-free calling?yes, stone 358 comes with an in-built mic that allows hands-free calling.q. what is the battery life of the device?stone 358 offers a battery backup of 4 hours on a single charge.q. can we accept calls on it?yes, one can accept calls on the speakers.q. can i charge my speakers with a mobile charger?yes, stone 358 can be charged with a mobile charger.q. can we use it while putting the speakers on charge?yes, stone 358 portable speakers can be used simultaneously while charging.q. is there a warranty for the product? how do i claim warranty?yes, all of our speakers come with a 1 year warranty. to register your device, visit https://support.boat-lifestyle.com/.    download manual

descriptor.name: boAt Rockerz 558 Sunburn Edition Cosmic Black
descriptor.short_desc: boat | sunburn rockerz 558 - wireless bluetooth headphoneswhen the best of boat meets asia’s biggest music festival, you are bound to have a blast! meet the over-ear wireless headset, boatxsunburn rockerz 558. the headphones come equipped with the latest bluetooth v5.0 for instant wireless connectivity. its powerful 500mah battery provides playtime of up to 20 hours for you to groove nonstop! the 50mm dynamic drivers bring alive your favourite tunes through its thumping bass. hear every beat as it drops with the bombastic rockerz 558.50mm dynamic drivers: immersive audioits 50mm dynamic drivers help pump out immersive audio that matches your vibe and sets your zone. superior playback: up to 20 hours of music blissthe mighty 500mah battery capacity offers a superior playback time of up to 20 hours ensuring that nothing stops your jamming sesh. physical noise isolationbelieve it or not, the physical noise isolation eradicates all the disturbing elements from your environment, leaving just you and the beats of sunburn vibin’ together. specificationsconnect & playheadphone typeover-eardriver typemoving coil driverdriver size50 mmimpedance32ωsensitivity (db)90db±3dbfrequency response20hz-20khzbattery capacity (mah)500 mahplayback time20 hourscharging time2.5 hoursstandby time180 hoursbluetooth versionv5.0country of originchinacompatibilityall bluetooth devicesbluetooth range10m ergonomically designed over-ear headphonedesigned ergonomically, rockerz 550 will keep your comfort as the utmost priority while you have long grooving sessions to your heart's content. faqq. can we accept calls on it? is it good for calls, meetings and work from home?rockerz 558 are designed for great clarity and comfort during meetings and important calls. single press on the multi-function button to easily accept and reject calls.q. can we connect aux wire?yes, you can connect aux wire to your rockerz 558.q. is it good for running and sports in general?yes, rockerz 558 on-ear headphones have ipx5 dust and water resistance making it perfect for sports and adventures.q. does it have a dedicated microphone?yes, rockerz 558 headphones has a dedicated mic perfect for calls and recording.q. can i charge my headphones with a mobile charger?yes, rockerz 558 wireless headphones can be charged with a mobile charger.q. how long does it take to charge? does it support fast charging?rockerz 558 takes 1.5h to fully charge. it does not support fast charging.q. can we use it while putting the headphones on charge?yes, one can use the device while charging it at the same time.q. what bluetooth version does rockerz 550 support?rockerz 558 wireless bluetooth headphones supports bluetooth v5.0.q. what can i do with the inline buttons?you can change tracks, adjust volume, take and reject calls, redial, and access voice assistant with the inline buttons. for further information, please refer to the user manual.q. how can i enable google and siri?double tap to connect with google & siri and activate the voice assistant. please refer to the manual for further instructions.q. is there a warranty for the product? how do i claim warranty?yes, all of our wireless earphones & headphones come with a 1 year warranty. to register your device, visit https://support.boat-lifestyle.com/.    download manual

descriptor.name: Stone 260 | Portable Bluetooth speaker with 5 Hours of Playtime, Super Extra Bass, IPX5 Water Resistant Gray
descriptor.short_desc: stone 260boat stone 260 portable bluetooth speaker can be wirelessly connected to bluetooth devices such as smartphones, tablets, and computers to playback any music collection stored on them. thanks to its powerful battery, the system delivers powerful sound, separated from any mains supply, for up to 5 hours and is the perfect companion for you in the park, or whilst camping or on the beach. what's more? it sports a trendy look & is ipx5 waterproof certified, process control can get rid of complicated connections and wiring distance constraints, users can enjoy high-quality music. plug it in plug into nirvana.wireless bluetooth connectivitybluetooth 4.1 transmission with no loss of audio performance.5 hours of playtime per chargeits powerful 1000mah battery offers a playback time of up to 5 hours.integrated controlswith a multi-function button and volume buttons that allow for easy interface, ensuring that nothing stands between you and your favorite music. specificationsconnect & playspeaker typemonoipx ratingipx5driver typeinner magnetdriver size4.9784 cmimpedance4ωsensitivity (db)80db±3dbfrequency response180hz-20khzbattery capacity (mah)1000 mahplayback time5 hourscharging time2 hoursstandby time360 hoursbluetooth versionv4.1country of originchinacompatibilityall bluetooth devicesbluetooth range10m ipx6 water resistantslip and slide on your favorite rides with the waves of nirvana in this compact design that carries an ipx 6 water resistant design, break on through. faqq. is it water resistant?stone 260 comes with ipx5 dust and water resistance.q. can we connect it via aux?no, stone 260 bluetooth speakers can not be connected via aux cable.q. do we get a charger along with the speaker?no, stone 260 does not come with a charger in the box.q. does it have an in-built mic for hands-free calling?yes, stone 260 comes with an in-built mic that allows hands-free calling.q. what is the battery life of the device?stone 260 offers a battery backup of 5 hours on a single charge.q. can we accept calls on it?yes, one can accept calls on the speakers.q. can i charge my speakers with a mobile charger?yes, stone 260 can be charged with a mobile charger.q. can we use it while putting the speakers on charge?yes, stone 260 portable speakers can be used simultaneously while charging.q. is there a warranty for the product? how do i claim warranty?yes, all of our speakers come with a 1 year warranty. to register your device, visit https://support.boat-lifestyle.com/.    download manual

it sports a trendy look & is ipx5 waterproof certified, process control can get rid of complicated connections and wiring distance constraints, users can enjoy high-quality music. plug it in plug into nirvana.wireless bluetooth connectivitybluetooth 4.1 transmission with no loss of audio performance.5 hours of playtime per chargeits powerful 1000mah battery offers a playback time of up to 5 hours.integrated controlswith a multi-function button and volume buttons that allow for easy interface, ensuring that nothing stands between you and your favorite music. specificationsconnect & playspeaker typemonoipx ratingipx5driver typeinner magnetdriver size4.9784 cmimpedance4ωsensitivity (db)80db±3dbfrequency response180hz-20khzbattery capacity (mah)1000 mahplayback time5 hourscharging time2 hoursstandby time360 hoursbluetooth versionv4.1country of originchinacompatibilityall bluetooth devicesbluetooth range10m ipx6 water resistantslip and slide on your favorite rides with the waves of nirvana in this compact design that carries an ipx 6 water resistant design, break on through. faqq. is it water resistant?stone 260 comes with ipx5 dust and water resistance.q. can we connect it via aux?no, stone 260 bluetooth speakers can not be connected via aux cable.q. do we get a charger along with the speaker?no, stone 260 does not come with a charger in the box.q. does it have an in-built mic for hands-free calling?yes, stone 260 comes with an in-built mic that allows hands-free calling.q. what is the battery life of the device?stone 260 offers a battery backup of 5 hours on a single charge.q. can we accept calls on it?yes, one can accept calls on the speakers.q. can i charge my speakers with a mobile charger?yes, stone 260 can be charged with a mobile charger.q. can we use it while putting the speakers on charge?yes, stone 260 portable speakers can be used simultaneously while charging.q. is there a warranty for the product? how do i claim warranty?yes, all of our speakers come with a 1 year warranty. to register your device, visit https://support.boat-lifestyle.com/.    download manual

descriptor.short_desc: boat storm pro - best fitness tracker smartwatchyour all-time favourite smartwatch is all pro-ed up! boat storm pro is here to match your fitness goals, aesthetically. this sleek & premium finished watch with our largest 1.78” amoled display will make you enter the vibrant world of perfection – right on your wrist!1.78 inches amoled displaystunning looks– vibrant. vivid. vast.created to perfection to bring you the best visual and touch experience with the largest 1.78 inches amoled display. keep things vibrant, vivid & vast. with crystal clear 325ppi pixel density and a premium metal body, the watch becomes a style statement wherever you go.faster & seamless performanceget smoother, faster & seamless performance with 60hz refresh rate. the capacitive touch makes you experience flawless transitions.always on displayno need to flick your wrist or tire the power button every time you have to see the time. try the always on mode to keep the display visible at all times. the vibrant colours and display won't rest, till you achieve the best.700+ active modesevery move counts with the stunning storm pro – from laughing to binge-watching, ballet to frisbee, and eating to snuggling. this smartwatch provides and tracks 700+ active modes so that the calories keep burning, and the watch keeps counting!asap™️ chargewhen you are always on the go, nothing should stop you. with fast charge, storm pro keeps you ready for the hustle, wherever, whenever in just 30 minutes.ip67 water resistant 24x7 heart rate, oxygen and sleep monitoring call text and notifications on the go upto 7 days of battery curated controls specificationsconnect & playmodelstorm proscreen type1.78 inch amoled displaybattery capacity200 mahbluetooth versionv 5.0working temperature-20 to 60 degreecharging timeabout 30 minutesworking timeupto 7 dayscountry of originchina   faqsq. does storm pro come with different watch faces?yes, storm pro comes with support for multiple watch faces and themes.q. does it have water resistance? is it good for long-term outdoor use?storm pro comes with ip68 and water resistance which makes it perfect for use in any environment.q. does it come with support for gps?storm pro does not come with an in-built gps.q. does it come with media controls?yes, storm pro comes with support for media controls. now control your music with just a single tap on the watch.q. how long does storm pro last on a single charge?storm pro has a battery backup of up to 10 days. it also supports asap fast charge and fully charges the device within 30 mins.q. what health features does storm pro support?storm pro comes with a host of health features including custom fitness plans, blood oxygen monitor, breathe control mode, sleep tracking, stress tracker and more. it also fully supports google fit and apple health. it also supports the boat crest app, fitness buddies, wellness crew for shared fitness plans and goals.q. does it support notifications for particular apps?yes, storm pro supports notification alerts for multiple applications, including calls, texts, social media notifications, sedentary & hydration alerts, and alarms. it also supports live cricket scores.q. is there a warranty for the product? how do i claim warranty?yes, all of our true wireless earphones come with a 1 year warranty. to register your device, visit https://support.boat-lifestyle.com/.      download manual

descriptor.name: boAt Aavante Bar Aaupera
descriptor.short_desc: aavante bar aaupera soundbar for smart tvraise the bar of your cinematic experience with aavante bar aaupera — our all-new smart home theatre system. with built-in alexa, an immersive binging experience is just a voice command away. equipped with far field mics, our smart soundbar with alexa will listen to you from every corner of your home. say it to play it!just ask alexa“alexa, play indie pop”. weather, latest cricket score, breaking news, your favourite movie, or your next track. let our first ever smart soundbar with built-in alexa keep you on top of your game.immersive soundunforgettable experienceexperience deeper bass and sharper highs with our all-new smart home theatre system. get an immersive sound experience that makes everything sound real. when you turn the aavante bar aaupera on, you tune into a virtual audio world of your making.2.1 channel smart soundbarimmerse in an audio realityexperience deeper bass and sharper highs with our all-new smart home theatre system. get an immersive sound experience that makes everything sound real. when you turn the aavante bar aaupera on, you tune into a virtual audio world of your making. always attentive. always listening.advanced dual far field micsthe advanced dual far field mics on the smart soundbar listen to your every command from every corner of your home. now your favourite movie and tracks are just an “alexa…” away. say it to play it.easy to pair, easier to playmulti-compatibility modeswith multi-compatibility modes on our smart home theatre, you can pair instantly with easy bluetooth connectivity or connect via usb, aux, hdmi (arc), and optical cables. no matter your preference, great quality of sound is assured.match the sound as per the settingentertainment eq modes for every moodswitch the vibe of your home with our first smart home theatre by switching between multiple entertainment eq modes like music, movies, news, and 3d spatial sound. whatever your mood, sync the sound to match it.specificationsconnect & playmodelaavante bar aaupera soundbardriver size2.25 inch x 4 sb + 6.5 inch swimpedance6ω*2+3ωfrequency range?aavante aaupera comes with a bluetooth range of 8-10 meters.q. is the subwoofer wired or wireless?aavante aaupera come with a wired subwoofer for deeper bass and richer sound.q.what smart features does it support?aavante aaupera comes with support for smart app control which allows you to seamlessly connect and control your device. it also comes with alexa built-in that allows you to check the weather, the latest cricket score, the breaking news of the hour or play your favourite tracks and more! you can now control your device using only commands that are supported in both hindi and english.q.does it support music streaming?aavante aaupera comes with full support for music streaming via spotify, jiosaavn and gaana.q. is there a warranty for the product? how do i claim Anti Tan Face Wash: This unique face wash deep cleanses the skin and effectively washes away impurities and tan. Ideal for dull and tanned skin, it's purifying properties leave skin refreshed and oil free. Enriched with Mulberry extract, it provides an even skin tone and deep cleanses the pores leaving skin fresh.
Rose Water Toner: This skin toner acts as a cooling and refreshing agent. It tones, nourishes and balances the skin.
D-Tan SPF 50 Sunscreen is a unique formulation, enriched with Carrot & Cucumber extracts, which delivers a powerful de-tanning action while protecting your skin from sun’s harmful UVA & UVB Rays. It effectively fades tan revealing brighter skin tone, helps fade dark patches leaving skin looking even, radiant & moisturised.

descriptor.long_desc:
This kit includes,
Dove Intense Repair Shampoo 1Ltr
Dove Intense Repair Conditioner 175ml
Dove Intense Repair Shampoo XXL Bottle
Is your hair showing signs of damage – split ends, dryness, roughness or hair fall? The secret of how to repair damaged hair? A strengthening shampoo that helps to treat the signs of damage with two-way care for both long and short-term results*. Give your hair the essential care it deserves with Dove Intense Repair Shampoo. The Intense Repair Shampoo works to restore the health and shine of your hair. It contains Fibre Actives, which penetrate your hair and rebuild damaged hair, to renew the lost gloss and vigour and give life to your damaged hair. Gentle enough for daily use, Dove Intense Repair Shampoo helps to immediately repair strands while nourishing them from within for healthy looking hair that’s stronger** This shampoo for damaged hair repairs signs of damage for smooth and strong hair. Formulated with Fibre Actives, this shampoo for damaged hair reinforces strands to prevent the signs of damage on hair. Nourishment for damaged hair to leave you with beautiful looking hair, all day long. *Based on lab test with Dove Intense Repair system vs non-conditioning shampoo **Strength against hair breakage, based on lab test with Dove Intense Repair system vs. non-conditioning shampoo.
Dove Intense Repair Conditioner, 175 ml
Does your hair get frizzy and unmanageable? Are you left wishing for a remedy to fix your frizzy tassels? Do you want to know the secret to fixing frizzy hair? Try New Dove Intense Repair Conditioner. Control frizz with a nourishing conditioner that’s formulated to nourish and help with frizz prevention. Formulated with Keratin Actives, Dove Intense Repair Conditioner helps to nourish dry and frizzy hair with two-way care. It controls external signs of dryness in the form of frizz, while nourishing strands to help them look their best. This conditioner for frizzy, damaged hair leaves hair visibly smooth and more manageable – giving you smoother hair* that you will be proud of. Use it after your shampoo on damp hair for best results. This nourishing conditioner works immediately to smoothen the hair surface, deeply nourishing to moisturize hair strands for healthier looking and smoother*hair. With every use, you’ll be left with smooth, shiny and beautiful hair. Buy New Dove Intense Repair conditioner and treat your hair to a look that will be the cause of envy among all your friends. Dove Conditioners, for 100% care.*Based on lab test with Dove Intense Repair system vs non-conditioning shampoo.

Trusted for over 2 decades, Horlicks Moth...
descriptor.long_desc:
The right nutrition during pregnancy is important for the mother’s health and baby’s growth and the mother’s daily diet alone may sometimes not be sufficient.
Trusted for over 2 decades, Horlicks Mother’s Plus is scientifically designed to provide tailor-made nutrition for pregnancy and lactation.
It contains 25 vital nutrients that are important to provide the nutrition for the mother’s health and baby’s growth.
It contains 100% RDAs of Vitamin B2, Vitamin B12 and Vitamin C during pregnancy and 100% RDAs of Folic acid and Iron during lactation.
During the first 6 months, a new born baby1 is dependent on the mother’s milk to derive nutrition.
Therefore, it is important that the new mother gets enough amount of nutrients to meet the baby’s needs in addition to her own requirements .
Horlicks Mother's Plus contains micronutrients (Iron, Iodine, Folic Acid, Zinc, Magnesium, Vitamin A, B6, B12, Vitamin D and protein) that are known to support healthy birth weight.
It also contains DHA and Choline known to support Brain Development and micronutrients like Vitamins B1, B2, B6, B12, A, D; Iodine and Selenium which are known to help improve the quality of breast milk .
Horlicks Mother's Plus contains 50% RDAs^ of Immunity supporting nutrients like Vitamin A, E, B6 and Selenium.
Horlicks Mother's Plus is a nutritional beverage to be consumed as a part of daily diet.

Bru Instant coffee can be used to make an aromatic cup of hot coffee as well as a refreshing glass of cold coffee. With Bru Instant, you can now discover a great coffee experience with your loved ones. Buy Now!

Perfect for Bru Instant coffee can be used to make an aromatic cup of hot coffee as well as a refreshing glass of cold coffee right away!
Try this The best coffee beans are selected from across innumerable coffee trails and freshly roasted, to serve a great cup of rich, irresistible coffee. BRU has four distinct offerings – BRU Instant and BRU Gold in Instant coffee, BRU Green Label and BRU Select in Filter coffee. BRU-ed with love and blended with passion, BRU Coffee celebrates authenticity in coffee and relationships.

descriptor.name: Kissan Mixed Fruit Jam 700 g and Kissan Peanut Butter Crunchy 920 g (Combo Pack)
descriptor.short_desc: This Includes Kissan Mixed Fruit Jam 700 g and Kissan Peanut Butter Crunchy 920 g All your favorite fruits come together in Kissan Mixed Fruit Jam. A medley of flavours from 8 fruits such as Banana, P...
descriptor.long_desc:
This Includes Kissan Mixed Fruit Jam 700 g and Kissan Peanut Butter Crunchy 920 g All your favorite fruits come together in Kissan Mixed Fruit Jam. A medley of flavours from 8 fruits such as Banana, Papaya, Apple, Pear, Pineapple, Mango, Grape and Orange blended in to one lip smacking jam. Kissan jam is the best jam with the goodness of your favorite 8 fruits. Kissan Mixed Fruit Jam is best partnered with bread to provide yummy on the go breakfast for your kid every morning. Think of different ways to eat it in. Spread it on a crunchy cracker, roll it up in a chapatti, drink it stirred in milk or whip up a bread and Jam delight for your kids’ breakfast with an assortment of flavours. Started in 1934, Kissan is a popular brand in India. Kissan is more than just jams, ketchups and squashes. It’s all about kids eating happily & growing up happily. Kissan Jam’s yummy and fruit based sweet spread keeps both, mothers & kids happy. The brand’s reassurance to mothers is that they can make breakfast times fun yet wholesome every morning with the Kissan range of fruit jams that are made with 100% real fruit ingredients! Remember craving something utterly sweet? This is your answer to that in a packed sweet spread bottle.
Kissan Mixed Fruit Jam is made with 100% real fruit ingredients.
Is easy to use and can be enjoyed on the go every morning.
Enjoy it best with Bread, Roti, Paratha or Dosa for a wholesome breakfast.
Turns boring breakfast into an empty plate.
Spreads easily with a spoon or a knife.
Carefully sealed in impermeable glass packaging to retain the best flavour and taste of product.
Kissan Peanut Butter, with 100% real peanuts handpicked from the farms of Gujarat, is a rich source of protein. An ideal option for mothers looking for protein-based food for their children. The product has no added colours and flavours. There is no preservative in Kissan Peanut Butter. 1 serve of Kissan Peanut Butter (30g) has as much quantity of protein as 1 bowl of dal (30 g uncooked dal) or a handful of Almonds (40 g) or 1 glass of cow’s milk (200 ml) or 1 egg (50 g). With Protein constituting 25% of Peanut butter, it is one of the richest plant-based protein sources available. Known as the nutrient that is the building block of the body nutrient that builds us, Protein is very important for normal growth and development of children, building muscles & maintaining bones, body repair & recovery - all of which helps keep our body stay strong from within. So go ahead and enjoy the goodness of peanut protein with Kissan Peanut Butter!
India's Finest Quality Peanuts
Rich in Protein from 100% real peanuts
Quantity of protein: 2 tbsp Kissan Peanut Butter (30g) ≈ 1 glass of cow's milk (200ml)
Gluten free
No added colours & flavours
No added preservative.

Knorr has four interesting Chinese Ready To Cook variants –Chinese Manchurian, Chilli, Schezuan gravy mixes and Fried Rice/Noodles instant mix. Great taste is in our nature! Now make Restaurant-like Chinese at home with Knorr Chinese Easy to Cook in just 3 steps.
Make in 3 Easy Steps:
Prepare manchurian balls (Mix 2 cups grated vegetables with 1/2 Maida in water to make pakora style batter, make balls & deep fry like pakoras)
Stir fry 2 cups chopped vegetables till they are cooked
In a separate bowl, mix the contents of this pack with 450 ml water. Add it to the vegetables & cook till sauce becomes thick.
Add Manchurian balls to the prepared sauce & cook for 1 min. Serve hot!
3 simple steps
Serves 4
Simply add 4 cups vegetables and 1/2 cup maida
No added preservaties
Restaurant like Chinese at home
Goes well with: Knorr Chinese Noodles/Fried Rice

Love both soup and noodles? Knorr’s Hong Kong Manchow soup is a treat to Chinese lovers. Now enjoy the slurp taste of noodles with the deliciousness of soup. With crunchy vegetables, soothing aroma and flavour of cilantro, and the right balance of different sauces flavours, the Knorr Hong Kong Manchow soup is the perfect, ready-to-eat cook soup for those sudden cravings. Usually, making soup is a very arduous process. Sourcing vegetables, cutting them, looking for the essential spices, and hunting your fridge for the right sauces. It takes away from the fun of being able to quickly satisfy your cravings. Knorr soups allow you to have restaurant-like soup at home. Just open the pack, add water, cook and enjoy delicious, perfectly consistent soup at home! Now make your home the centre for parties and dinners with Knorr’s wide range of 11 ready-to-cook soups and 7 cup-a-soup variants. With Knorr as your cooking partner, you can serve your loved ones flavourful meals at home. Our love for carefully selected ingredients, flavours and spices, pushes us to make recipes that will be enjoyed by your family, friends, relatives and guests, and the people that matter to you the most.

Contains no added preservatives
Ready to eat in 3 simple steps
Serves 4

descriptor.name: Dove Daily Shine Shampoo 1Ltr and Dove Daily Shine Conditioner 180ml(Combo Pack)
descriptor.short_desc:
This kit includes,
Dove Daily Shine Shampoo 1Ltr 
Dove Daily Shine Conditioner180ml

The mystery of how to get shiny hair isn't a tricky one to solve. The key to getting shiny damage free hair we all ...
descriptor.long_desc:
This kit includes,
Dove Daily Shine Shampoo 1Ltr 
Dove Daily Shine Conditioner180ml

The mystery of how to get shiny hair isn't a tricky one to solve. The key to getting shiny damage free hair we all long for is making sure your hair is nourished, from the start of your routine. That's where Dove Daily Shine Shampoo comes in. Dove Daily Shine Shampoo with Nutritive Serum builds a protective shield around the hair fiber and defends your hair from daily hair damage. It is a gentle hair cleanser that keeps your hair looking healthy and lustrous. It is mild on your scalp but gives protection from the aggression your hair faces every day. Its Nutritive Serum absorbs into the hair strands to keep them beautifully nourished and shiny, this Dove shampoo surrounds your hair with a protective shield, defending it from everyday stresses, like brushing & damage.
Dove Daily Shine Conditioner, 180 ml
Ask us how to make hair shiny and we'll tell you that the answer is easy: use a nourishing conditioner that smoothens and strengthens. Because when hair is sleek and conditioned, it reflects more light, giving that beautiful shiny finish. Protect the health and shine of your hair with the Daily Shine Conditioner from Dove. Enriched with our Nutritive Serum, Dove Daily Shine Conditioner smooths over the strands' cuticles, leaving soft, silky hair with added strength and shine from the very first wash. All you need to do is, apply a small amount of conditioner to your hair from mid lengths to tips and rinse it off after a minute to get shiny and manageable hair, every day. And because we don't want daily wear and tear to get in the way of our shine, it protects hair from future damage, even from your brush. Not only does the formula give visible results after the first use, but it makes hair better*, making it look healthy. For hair that's soft, smooth and beautiful with every wash, Dove Daily Shine Conditioner is an ideal addition to your hair care routine. *Based on lab test with Dove Daily Shine System vs non-conditioning shampoo.

Built to keep you ready on the go, this stylish, portable kit contains all the essentials a man on the move needs. Enriched by the mischievous interplay of unique seductive ingredients, this long-lasting fragrance has been crafted for a refreshing beat in Axe's iconic style.
AXE Signature Mysterious Body Perfume 122 ml: Made for the urban metrosexual man this perfume combines a hint of zesty citrus and a mild note of woody musk to give you a super enticing fragrance that lasts all day long with 3 times more perfume in every drop*
AXE Denim After Shave Lotion 50 ml: For the man who doesn’t have to try too hard. Who likes to play it smooth. Axe Signature Denim After Shave Lotion is made just for you. This calming lotion helps amplify a smooth shave and leaves your skin feeling soft and fresh. A spicy, rich, masculine cologne scent with bursts of citrus gives you a day long fresh feeling .Start your day with Axe Denim Shaving Cream and complete your morning shave with Axe Signature Denim After Shave Lotion
AXE Denim Lather Shaving Cream 78 g: The Axe Denim Shaving Cream is rich, creamy lather enriched with moisturisers that tames the toughest stubble, leaving your skin smooth and irresistible to touch. It’s enriched with citrusy swirls for a spicy masculine scent. Just squeeze the tube to get the needed Axe Denim shaving cream on your shaving brush, lather with water and get the closest smooth shave possible. It is completely safe on your skin.

Perfect as a daily hair fall* treatment, the gentle formula fortifies strands to reduce hair fall*. Enriched with Nutrilock Actives, our best shampoo for hair fall* immediately seals cuticles and strengthens strands to help minimize hair fall due to breakages, leaving them looking fuller. Say no to hair fall worries and do more in life.
