Fortify hair fibers with every wash. Enriched with Nutrilock Actives, the nourishing formula immediately seals cuticles and strengthens your hair to minimize breakage. Is your hair showing signs of damage – split ends, dryness, roughness or hair fall? The secret of how to repair damaged hair? A strengthening shampoo that helps to treat the signs of damage with two-way care for both long and short-term results*. Give your hair the essential care it deserves with Dove Intense Repair Shampoo. The Intense Repair Shampoo works to restore the health and shine of your hair. It contains Fibre Actives, which penetrate your hair and rebuild damaged hair, to renew the lost gloss and vigour and give life to your damaged hair. Gentle enough for daily use, Dove Intense Repair Shampoo helps to immediately repair strands while nourishing them from within for healthy looking hair that’s stronger** This shampoo for damaged hair repairs signs of damage for smooth and strong hair. Formulated with Fibre Actives, this shampoo for damaged hair reinforces strands to prevent the signs of damage on hair. Nourishment for damaged hair to leave you with beautiful looking hair, all day long. *Based on lab test with Dove Intense Repair system vs non-conditioning shampoo **Strength against hair breakage, based on lab test with Dove Intense Repair system vs. non-conditioning shampoo.

It controls external signs of dryness in the form of frizz, while nourishing strands to help them look their best. This conditioner for frizzy, damaged hair leaves hair visibly smooth and more manageable – giving you smoother hair* that you will be proud of. This nourishing conditioner works immediately to smoothen the hair surface, deeply nourishing to moisturize hair strands for healthier looking and smoother*hair. And because we don't want daily wear and tear to get in the way of our shine, it protects hair from future damage, even from your brush. Not only does the formula give visible results after the first use, but it makes hair better*, making it look healthy. For hair that's soft, smooth and beautiful with every wash, Dove Daily Shine Conditioner is an ideal addition to your hair care routine. *Based on lab test with Dove Daily Shine System vs non-conditioning shampoo.

descriptor.short_desc: Repeated washing with only detergent can tangle cloth fibres, making them rough, dull and lifeless. Comfort Delicates, fabric conditioner provides gentle care and unbeatable softness for delicate fabr...
descriptor.long_desc:
Repeated washing with only detergent can tangle cloth fibres, making them rough, dull and lifeless. Comfort Delicates, fabric conditioner provides gentle care and unbeatable softness for delicate fabrics and lingerie. The fragrances of soft peonies and spring lilies keeps them smelling fresh! Comfort Delicates is a dermatologically tested formula with 99.9% anti-bacterial action, designed to be safe and soft on skin.
Soaking delicate fabric in a Comfort Delicates fabric conditioner and water solution for just 5 minutes after detergent wash helps provide that extra gentle care that your favourite lingerie or delicates require.
While bucket washing, after washing your clothes with laundry detergent, soak delicate fabrics for 5 minutes in a bucket of water containing 20 ml of Comfort Delicates and put them out to dry. Do not rinse with water after soaking in Comfort.
While machine washing, add 40 ml of Comfort Delicates into the softener compartment or directly into the washing tub in the last rinse cycle.Semi-automatic machine: Wash your clothes with detergent as usual. Pour 40 ml of comfort in the machine tub in clean water during the last rinse cycle. Top load: If your machine has a softener compartment, pour 40 ml of comfort at the start of wash cycle. Otherwise, pour 40 ml of comfort in the machine tub during last rinse cycle. Front load: Pour 40 ml of comfort in the softener/conditioner compartment at the same time as you add detergent.
Enjoy the feeling of gentle care with Comfort delicates!
Dermatologically tested to be safe on delicate skin
Provides 99.9% anti-bacterial action.
Keeps delicate fabric and lingerie soft.
Mild, gentle fragrances of soft peonies and spring lilies help  keep delicates fresh.
Bucket wash- Comfort Delicates dosage: 20 ml. Machine wash- Comfort delicates dosage: 40 ml.
Do not rinse again with water after soaking in Comfort.

descriptor.long_desc:
Indulge in the soothing effect of specially curated fragrances with relaxwave technology for your bed linens. Comfort Sweet Dreams fabric conditioner with enchanting Lavender and Relaxing Rosemary fragrances are specially crafted for your bed linens. These fragrances blend in harmony to give you the perfect soothing, cosy feeling as you drift away into sweet dreams on your soft bed linens.
While bucket washing, after washing bed linens with laundry detergent, soak them for 5 minutes in a bucket of water containing 20 ml of Comfort Sweet Dreams and put them out to dry. Do not rinse with water after soaking in Comfort.
While machine washing, add 40 ml of Comfort Sweet Dreams into the softener compartment or directly into the washing tub in the last rinse cycle.
Semi-automatic machine: Wash your bed linens with detergent as usual. Pour 40 ml of comfort in the machine tub in clean water during the last rinse cycle. Top load: If your machine has a softener compartment, pour 40 ml of comfort at the start of wash cycle. Otherwise, pour 40 ml of comfort in the machine tub during last rinse cycle. Front load: Pour 40 ml of comfort in the softener/conditioner compartment at the same time as you add detergent.
Soothing fragrances of Lavender and Rosemary for your bed linens
Fragrances designed with Relaxwave Technology
Unbeatable softness for a cozy sle+N3+O3
Provides 99.9% anti-bacterial action.
Do not rinse again with water after soaking in Comfort.
Bucket wash- Comfort Sweet Dreams dosage: 20 ml. Machine wash- Comfort Sweet Dreams dosage: 40 ml.

descriptor.name: VWash Plus Expert Intimate Hygiene, 350ml
descriptor.short_desc: "The best defence against any vaginal discomfort is prevention. Protect your most delicate area with daily use of a special product – VWash PLUS. With a pH of 3.5, V Wash restores pH in the intimate a...
descriptor.long_desc:
"The best defence against any vaginal discomfort is prevention. Protect your most delicate area with daily use of a special product – VWash PLUS. With a pH of 3.5, V Wash restores pH in the intimate area and helps to prevent irritation, itching and dryness in the intimate area.
The vagina has a natural protective layer which is acidic in nature, to help prevent infection. This layer is maintained when good bacteria called lactobacilli produce Lactic acid , which maintains the acidic environment at a pH value of 3.5 to 4.5. This promotes the growth of lactobacilli, inhibiting the presence of harmful bacteria and preventing infection. A healthy vaginal flora requires a pH of 3.5 - 4.5. Most soaps are alkaline in nature which have a pH value of 8 & above. The daily use of soap to cleanse the vaginal area may upsets ideal pH balance of the vagina. This may leads to vaginal discomforts like dryness, irritation & itching and could eventually lead to vaginal infections.
VWash PLUS has lactic acid which restores vaginal pH balance and is enriched with sea buckthorn oil which contains an abundance of vitamins, minerals, antioxidants & amino acids. Daily washing with VWash PLUS leaves a fresh sensation & maintains healthy vaginal flora. It also helps prevent unpleasant odour & irritation in the intimate area.It is safe for daily use. It is Paraben & SLS/SLES free. VWash Plus is usable during periods as well.
Now don’t just wash, VWash PLUS."

"Silk is a natural microfiber, enveloped in the warmth of cocoon during its nascent stage. Its amino acid composition is close to that of human skin and when the silk fiber comes in contact with water, it becomes ultra-sensitive to abrasion. Just like how chemicals can react on our skin and prove to be harmful, similarly, regular detergents can make these silk fabrics look chaffed, brittle and as if covered with white residue. Love & Care is an expert range of fabric wash designed to take care of your special clothes, it is a pH balanced formula which is designed to be gentle on silk and retains shine unlike regular detergents. The expert care liquid detergent is crafted with No Enzymes and No Bleach which maintains the strength and colour of the fabric. The next time you flaunt your chanderi silk kurta, mysore silk sari or banarasi dupatta with zari work remember to care for it as well with a gentle hand wash of Love & Care. It maintains the flowiness of Chiffons, cares for the drapes on Crepe and gives an overall bouncy look to Georgettes. The Love & Care range is recommended by India’s leading fashion designer Manish Malhotra who is an expert in fabrics and fashion. Love & Care is a brand of Hindustan Unilever Limited."
Love & Care is an expert range of fabric wash specially designed to take care of your special clothes.

"Silk is a natural microfiber, enveloped in the warmth of cocoon during its nascent stage. Its amino acid composition is close to that of human skin and when the silk fiber comes in contact with water, it becomes ultra-sensitive to abrasion. Just like how chemicals can react on our skin and prove to be harmful, similarly, regular detergents can make these silk fabrics look chaffed, brittle and as if covered with white residue. Love & Care is an expert range of fabric wash designed to take care of your special clothes, it is a pH balanced formula which is designed to be gentle on silk and retains shine unlike regular detergents. The expert care liquid detergent is crafted with No Enzymes and No Bleach which maintains the strength and colour of the fabric. The next time you flaunt your chanderi silk kurta, mysore silk sari or banarasi dupatta with zari work remember to care for it as well with a gentle hand wash of Love & Care. It maintains the flowiness of Chiffons, cares for the drapes on Crepe and gives an overall bouncy look to Georgettes. The Love & Care range is recommended by India’s leading fashion designer Manish Malhotra who is an expert in fabrics and fashion. Love & Care is a brand of Hindustan Unilever Limited."
Authentic wool is made of a protein called keratin which is also responsible for keeping our hair follicles healthy and nourished. Most detergents contain chemicals like enzymes which are extremely harsh on delicate woollen wear, making them weakened, mis-shaped, cause holes in them and also takes away their natural softness. Love & Care is carefully designed with pH neutral formula – thereby maintaining its softness and lustre. It keeps your precious woollens looking newer for much longer. The Soft Woollens variant is specially designed to be extremely mild on your soft woollen clothes. The liquid detergent is designed to be pH neutral that keep the strength of the wool intact. The No Enzymes and No Bleach formula cares for delicate fibres, prevents shrinkage of your woollens and retains new like shine. The low foaming formula also avoids over rinsing and prevents shrinkage of your woollen wear, keeps it looking new. The next time you flaunt your beautiful woollen sweater remember to care for it as well with a gentle hand wash of Love & Care. The Love & Care range is recommended by India’s leading fashion designer Manish Malhotra who is an expert in fabrics and fashion. Love & Care is a brand of Hindustan Unilever Limited.

descriptor.name: VWash Plus Expert Intimate Hygiene, 200ml
descriptor.short_desc: "The best defence against any vaginal discomfort is prevention. Protect your most delicate area with daily use of a special product – VWash PLUS. With a pH of 3.5, V Wash restores pH in the intimate a...
descriptor.long_desc:
"The best defence against any vaginal discomfort is prevention. Protect your most delicate area with daily use of a special product – VWash PLUS. With a pH of 3.5, V Wash restores pH in the intimate area and helps to prevent irritation, itching and dryness in the intimate area.
The vagina has a natural protective layer which is acidic in nature, to help prevent infection. This layer is maintained when good bacteria called lactobacilli produce Lactic acid , which maintains the acidic environment at a pH value of 3.5 to 4.5. This promotes the growth of lactobacilli, inhibiting the presence of harmful bacteria and preventing infection. A healthy vaginal flora requires a pH of 3.5 - 4.5. Most soaps are alkaline in nature which have a pH value of 8 & above. The daily use of soap to cleanse the vaginal area may upsets ideal pH balance of the vagina. This may leads to vaginal discomforts like dryness, irritation & itching and could eventually lead to vaginal infections.
VWash PLUS has lactic acid which restores vaginal pH balance and is enriched with sea buckthorn oil which contains an abundance of vitamins, minerals, antioxidants & amino acids. Daily washing with VWash PLUS leaves a fresh sensation & maintains healthy vaginal flora. It also helps prevent unpleasant odour & irritation in the intimate area.It is safe for daily use. It is Paraben & SLS/SLES free. VWash Plus is usable during periods as well.
Now don’t just wash, VWash PLUS."

This can cause rashes, acne, eczema, dryness, dark spots and even premature aging.

It helps uncover your natural radiance by working on the outside removing dead skin cells and going deeper to clean out all other impurities in your skin. The unique formula used in this face wash features activated charcoal that work from deep within your pores to the surface to give you clear skin that’s radiant with a natural glow. This ingredient acts as a magnet that draws out the pollution, dirt and dust from your skin allowing it to be cleansed thoroughly.

Lakmé  9 to 5 CC Cream brings you the best of both worlds: It’s skincare with a touch of makeup to give you the perfect look, for any occasion, in an instant.

The extracts of the herbs are cooked in virgin coconut oil and made to mature under natural sunlight for 7 days. The power of Sun and potency of these herbs goes into making every bottle of Indulekha Oil.

Apart from Bringharaj, it also contains Herbs like Neem, Shikakai, Tulsi and Amla which are known to provide rich source of Antioxidants, Minerals, Micronutrients and Vitamins. The presence of these Minerals and Nutrients helps in reducing Hair Fall, Increases Blood Circulation to the scalp and Strengthens Hair Follicles. Further, the presence of Micronutrients helps in effective cleansing of the scalp caused by dirt and pollution. It also helps in removing excessive oil from the scalp there by keeping pores of the scalp unclogged. Indulekha Bringha shampoo also contains Rosemary Oil known for its anti-inflammatory properties which helps in preventing scalp itchiness and also promotes thicker hair. The shampoo is free from Parabens, Synthetic Dyes and Synthetic Perfume. descriptor.name: VWash Plus Expert Intimate Hygiene, 100ml
descriptor.short_desc: "The best defence against any vaginal discomfort is prevention. Protect your most delicate area with daily use of a special product – VWash PLUS. With a pH of 3.5, V Wash restores pH in the intimate a...
descriptor.long_desc:
"The best defence against any vaginal discomfort is prevention. Protect your most delicate area with daily use of a special product – VWash PLUS. With a pH of 3.5, V Wash restores pH in the intimate area and helps to prevent irritation, itching and dryness in the intimate area.
The vagina has a natural protective layer which is acidic in nature, to help prevent infection. This layer is maintained when good bacteria called lactobacilli produce Lactic acid , which maintains the acidic environment at a pH value of 3.5 to 4.5. This promotes the growth of lactobacilli, inhibiting the presence of harmful bacteria and preventing infection. A healthy vaginal flora requires a pH of 3.5 - 4.5. Most soaps are alkaline in nature which have a pH value of 8 & above. The daily use of soap to cleanse the vaginal area may upsets ideal pH balance of the vagina. This may leads to vaginal discomforts like dryness, irritation & itching and could eventually lead to vaginal infections.
VWash PLUS has lactic acid which restores vaginal pH balance and is enriched with sea buckthorn oil which contains an abundance of vitamins, minerals, antioxidants & amino acids. Daily washing with VWash PLUS leaves a fresh sensation & maintains healthy vaginal flora. It also helps prevent unpleasant odour & irritation in the intimate area.It is safe for daily use. It is Paraben & SLS/SLES free. VWash Plus is usable during periods as well.
Now don’t just wash, VWash PLUS."

Ignoring your super important post shave care? Not anymore! The all new Axe Ultrasmooth Aftershave Balm is here to bring about your after-shave calm. Infused with Glycerine and Antioxidants, this unique formulation moisturizes your skin, giving it the much-needed hydration after every shave. Get in on the secrets of a great shave regime for that oh-so-smooth feeling that helps you get closer. Not sure on how to use after shave balm? It’s easy. "It’s not just a cup of tea, its therapy - One Sip at a Time.
Lipton Green Tea is not just a regular cup of chai, we believe it’s therapy for your body. Wake up to a morning cup of hot Lipton green tea and feel how it leaves you feeling light and active. Awaken your senses - one sip at a time. Lipton Green Tea Bags in Honey Lemon Flavor have this goodness. Choose Lipton Green Tea Honey Lemon as your go-to beverage during the day. Buy Now!
Magic of Green Tea
Green tea is produced when freshly plucked leaves are heated, rolled/cut and then dried. The catechins in the fresh leaves are preserved during the green tea process, making green tea rich in catechins. Also, green tea is typically drunk without milk and sugar and hence gives zero calories as compared to the ordinary chai made with milk and sugar.
Available in a Range of Flavors
Lipton offers a range of different flavours to ensure that you are offered variety and enjoyment while drinking tea. Lipton flavours some of its teas with added natural flavours and no artificial flavours are used. You may try Lipton Green tea in Pure & Light (unflavored), Tulsi Natura, Honey & Lemon and Lemon Zest flavors as well, available in pack sizes of 10s and 25s Tea bags.
Next best to Water
Brewed, Unsweetened Lipton Green Tea being 99.5% water is a great way to meet your daily required fluid intake. Staying hydrated is essential to ensure bodily functions are carried out efficiently."

descriptor.short_desc: Simple Kind to Skin Refreshing Facial Wash, Soothing Facial Toner & Hydrating Light Moisturiser Combo - (150ml +200ml +125ml)  Have dry, acne prone sensitive skin? Simple Moisturising Facial Wash is j...
descriptor.long_desc: Simple Kind to Skin Refreshing Facial Wash, Soothing Facial Toner & Hydrating Light Moisturiser Combo - (150ml +200ml +125ml)  Have dry, acne prone sensitive skin? Simple Moisturising Facial Wash is just facewash for your dry skin. This mild face wash thoroughly cleanses your skin, removing oil, dirt, and other impurities without leaving it to feel dry or dehydrated. Ideal for everyday use as part of your skincare routine. Gentle and moisturising like a cleanser milk, our moisturising face wash gives the perfect hydration required. This perfect moisture-balancing cleanser carefully blended with our purest possible ingredients and multi-vitamins, our facial wash is enriched with pro-vitamin B5, Vitamin E and Bisabolol, leaving your face feeling clean and refreshed. It’s a foam based formulation known to be the best facewash for sensitive skin. Our Moisturising Facial Wash like all Simple products contains no colour or dye, no soap and no artificial perfume. We’re dermatologically tested and approved, and ophthalmologically tested. Specially designed for sensitive skin users, we’re tested and approved hypoallergenic and non-comedogenic. Our Simple Kind to Skin Soothing Facial Toner features a special blend of Simple skin toning goodness to help keep skin toned and refreshed; this blend includes ingredients like Pro-Vitamin B5, Witch Hazel and Allantoin. It is a vegan facial toner that removes any alkaline residue left after cleansing, helping restore the balance to your skin's natural pH level. Great for sensitive skin. Did you notice that this bottle is a little greyish? It’s because it's made from 100% recycled plastic! A great skincare routine is as easy as 1,2,3 - with the middle step being a toner, of course! This facial toner is ideal for using after your cleanser and before your moisturiser morning and night to help remove those last traces of dirt and make-up from your skin. Like all of our products, our Soothing Facial Toner is perfect even for sensitive skin, containing no artificial perfumes or colours, and no harsh chemicals that can upset your skin. Looking for moisturiser that’s non greasy? Simple Kind to Skin Hydrating Light Moisturiser is just the moisturiser for oily skin. The oil free moisturiser provides care with a light feel on skin, leaves skin feeling soft, smooth and perfectly hydrated for up to 12 hours. Our face moisturiser is made with skin loving ingredients such as pro-vitamin B5 and vitamin E, also enriched with Borage seed oil which is known to not only restore moisture but also smoothens dry and damaged skin. Lightweight and fast-absorbing formulation that doesn’t clog pores, moisturizing your skin and keeping it pure and fresh. What more, it’s the best face moisturiser for sensitive skin. Our Hydrating Light Moisturiser like all Simple products contains no colour or dye, no alcohol, no parabens, no mineral oil and no artificial perfume. We’re dermatologically tested and approved, and ophthalmologically tested. Specially designed for sensitive skin users, we’re tested and approved hypoallergenic and non-comedogenic. At Simple, we’re all about Clean Beauty with 100% efficacy! And it’s really SIMPLE – no skin irritants, only skin loving ingredients as we know what we leave out of our products is just as important as what we put in! In fact, we only include ingredients that downright love your skin and respect its natural balance and build it further. Because all skin can be sensitive at times; pollution, stress, irritants, changing weather, lack of sleep and city living, there’s a million reasons why your skin can feel a little sensitive and need the extra care and kindness. And we believe Clean Beauty is Simple, even for sensitive skin!

"Over 50 Glorious years of Excellence, When the history of tea is written down, 1966 will be a celebrated chapter . For in that year, Brooke Bond Taj Mahal Tea was born, with a promise - To foster excellence in each tea cup. Fifty years on, we have not forgotten that promise. Enjoy your time in solitude, relax, reflect and Indulge by savouring the flavour of this historic blend and feel the aroma engulf you when you bring the tea cup close and with that first sip you will be saying WAH TAJ !
Taj Mahal tea true to its promise of serving great tasting teas has a range of premium handcrafted teas like black tea, green tea, white tea and Gourmet milk tea (masala chai). Taj mahal Gourmet tea has elaborate take on tea (Chai) concoctions with each flavour in the collection handcrafted by infusing exotic Indian ingredients with tea leaves. Some of these speciality teas are Royal Saffron , Bold Spice, Darjeeling 2nd flush teas, and are available on www.tajmahalteahouse.com."

descriptor.name: Polident Denture Fixative Cream, 20 gm
descriptor.short_desc:
"Polident Denture fixative cream is an adhesive or glue which holds dentures in place and seals out food particles from getting stuck beneath dentures.
It is suitable for everyone who wears a partial ...
descriptor.long_desc:
"Polident Denture fixative cream is an adhesive or glue which holds dentures in place and seals out food particles from getting stuck beneath dentures.
It is suitable for everyone who wears a partial or full denture, and is worried about his / her denture movement or food particles getting stuck between gums & dentures. The formulation doesn't contain zinc, artificial flavors or colors - thereby does not interfere with the taste of your favorite foods. The product enhances denture fit & comfort, and works all day to help protect gums from irritation.
The cream contains two adhesive polymers which absorb saliva and expand. As they expand, they interlock creating a soft and flexible 3-dimensional structure between your denture and gum tissue. This significantly increases surface coverage, creating a seal to help keep out food particles and provide a firm lasting hold. Because your dentures stay in place all day long, you need not worry about your dentures and can live a confident life - by enjoying your favorite foods, laughing out loud, singing or speaking confidently and getting close to your loved ones.
Polident Denture Fixative / Adhesive Cream is available in 20g pack. Always follow instructions and guidance included on the pack before use."
Polident Denture Fixative Cream provides strong, all day hold for dentures
Adhesive cream forms a protective seal to prevent irritating food particles from getting stuck between dentures & gums
Doesn't contain zinc - Polident is suitable for daily use.
Designed with no artificial colors or flavors - hence does not interfere with the taste of your favorite foods
From World's Number 1 Denture Care brand
Suitable for both partial and complete / full dentures

descriptor.name: St Ives Apricot Smooth Skin Face Wash for Deep Pore Cleansing 190g
descriptor.short_desc: You’re just one step away from your smoothest skin yet. Meet St. Ives Apricot Face Wash Smooth Skin, a gentle gel face wash that combines nature with science to deeply purify combination and oily skin...
descriptor.long_desc:
You’re just one step away from your smoothest skin yet. Meet St. Ives Apricot Face Wash Smooth Skin, a gentle gel face wash that combines nature with science to deeply purify combination and oily skin.
Why it works:
This double action St. Ives face wash for oily and combination skin has a naturally derived formula that’s infused with 2% salicylic acid – a dream ingredient for skin that’s prone to uneven texture. Combined with 100% natural apricot extract, the gentle yet effective formula deeply purifies your skin, lifting oil and impurities clean away.
Benefits:
Once the formula gets to work loosening up dead skin cells, the results are like magic: soft, smooth skin that looks so clear. This refreshing facial cleanser also has a juicy and fresh apricot scent you’ll love to use on the daily. It’s non-comedogenic, so it won’t cause breakouts and or clog your pores. Plus, the clean, green formula is made without parabens, soap or alcohol, so you know it’s nice and gentle.
How to use:
Whether you’re using this fruity face wash first thing in the morning or last thing at night (or both), the first step is always the same – splash your face with some water and apply a small amount of St. Ives face wash to your palms. Massage the cleanser onto your skin, working it into a lather. Then, rinse thoroughly.
Try this:
For the clearest, freshest skin, follow this salicylic acid face wash with the St. Ives Fresh Skin Face Scrub 3-4 times a week. It exfoliates rough, bumpy skin and removes impurities for skin that feels amazingly smooth. Plus, the pro-ceramide formula makes sure your skin gets the essential nutrients it needs. Win-win.
Globally, St. Ives does not test on animals and is PETA approved.
St. Ives Apricot Smooth Skin Face Wash deeply purifies your skin to leave it clear and smooth 
Clears excess oil and deep-seated dirt and pollution from your skin
Made with 100% natural extracts of juicy apricots, known to improve skin texture
Infused with 2% salicylic acid - a superstar ingredient that helps purify oily skin 
88% naturally derived face cleanser that is dermatologist tested, non-comedogenic (doesn't clog pores), soap free, paraben free & alcohol free
Designed in USA. Made in India.

However, unlike body skin, the skin on our lips does not naturally create its own moisture layer, leaving it susceptible to dryness and chapping. Also, the skin on lips are three times delicate than other body parts and thus calls for special care. The New Vaseline Lip therapy Tins with Petrolatum jelly helps moisturize dry lips and keep them soft. The new iconic tin pack design fits to palm and is easy to carry in your handbags and pockets so that you can easily moisturize your lips on the go! Vaseline Lip therapy with its specialized formulation which does not feel too greasy or sticky, help to form protective layer on lips which helps to lock in moisture and keep your lips beautiful with a glossy shine. The new Vaseline Lip Therapy tins are available in multiple variants: Original care- For healthy looking and soft lips every day! Cocoa butter- For healthy looking and glowing lips every day! Aloe- For healthy looking and Naturally soft lips every day! Grab your favourite Lip tin and say no to dry and chapped lips with Vaseline Lip therapy.
Direction for use:
1. Open the lid.
2. Apply the product gently on your lips with your index finger
3. Get moisturized and healthy-looking lips with a natural, glossy shine on the go!.

descriptor.long_desc:
Kickstart your day with St. Ives Tea Tree Pimple Clear 3 in 1 Face Scrub. It’s a deeply exfoliating scrub that combines nature and science, getting straight down to business to keep pesky pimples at bay, while also helping take care of the marks and dry, uneven skin left behind by pimples. The result? The clear, smooth skin of your dreams.
Why it works:
If you’re after smoother skin, this tea tree & walnut face scrub is the one. It’s made with 100% natural exfoliants and 2% salicylic acid, known for its skin-clearing powers, to work deep into your pores to help keep pimples away.
Benefits:
This smart scrub clears dead skin cells and buffs away any dryness or uneven skin left over from pimple eruptions. You’re left with visibly improved skin texture and a more even skin tone (think glass skin). It’s infused with a crisp natural scent, with a soap, paraben and alcohol free formula that’s clean, green and gentle on your skin.
How to use:
To use, simply splash your face with water and apply a dash of apricot scrub to your palm. Massage the face scrub onto damp skin and spread using circular motions. Then, rinse with water. For pimple-prone skin, use this exfoliating scrub for face 3-4 times a week.
Try this:
Try this simple two-step routine to help pimples go away – and stay away. Start with a refreshing cleanse with the St. Ives Pimple Clear Face Wash, a gentle gel wash that goes deep into your pores to clear away pimples. Then it’s time to scrub: follow with this Pimple Clear facial scrub a few times a week to help get rid of the marks and dry, uneven skin that pimples leave behind. Sorted.
Globally, St. Ives does not test on animals and is PETA approved.

descriptor.short_desc: This Includes Kissan Mixed Fruit Jam 1 Kg and Kissan Peanut Butter Crunchy 920 gm    All your favorite fruits come together in Kissan Mixed Fruit Jam. A medley of flavours from 8 fruits such as Banana...
descriptor.long_desc:
This Includes Kissan Mixed Fruit Jam 1 Kg and Kissan Peanut Butter Crunchy 920 gm    All your favorite fruits come together in Kissan Mixed Fruit Jam. A medley of flavours from 8 fruits such as Banana,Papaya, Apple, Pear, Pineapple, Mango, Grape and Orange blended in to one lip smacking jam. Kissan jam is the best jam with the goodness of your favorite 8 fruits. Kissan Mixed Fruit Jam is best partnered with bread to provide yummy on the go breakfast for your kid every morning. Think of different ways to eat it in. Spread it on a crunchy cracker,oll it up in a chapatti, drink it stirred in milk or whip up a bread and Jam delight for your kids’ breakfast with an assortment of flavours. Started in 1934, Kissan is a popular brand in India. Kissan is more than just jams, ketchups and squashes. It’s all about kids eating happily & growing up happily. Kissan Jam’s yummy and fruit based sweet spread keeps both; mothers & kids happy. The brand’s reassurance to mothers is that they can make breakfast times fun yet wholesome every morning with the Kissan range of fruit jams that are made with 100% real fruit ingredients! Remember craving something utterly sweet? This is your answer to that in a packed sweet spread bottle.
Kissan Peanut Butter, with 100% real peanuts handpicked from the farms of Gujarat, is a rich source of protein. An ideal option for mothers looking for protein-based food for their children. The product has no added colours and flavours. There is no preservative in Kissan Peanut Butter. 1 serve of Kissan Peanut Butter (30g) has as much quantity of protein as 1 bowl of dal (30 g uncooked dal) or a handful of Almonds (40 g) or 1 glass of cow’s milk (200 ml) or 1 egg (50 g). With Protein constituting 25% of Peanut butter, it is one of the richest plant-based protein sources available. Known as the nutrient that is the building block of the body nutrient that builds us, Protein is very important for normal growth and development of children, building muscles & maintaining bones, body repair & recovery - all of which helps keep our body stay strong from within. So go ahead and enjoy the goodness of peanut protein with Kissan Peanut Butter!
India's Finest Quality Peanuts
Rich in Protein from 100% real peanuts
Quantity of protein: 2 tbsp Kissan Peanut Butter (30g)  1 glass of cow's milk (200ml)
Gluten free
No added colours & flavours
No added preservatives

descriptor.long_desc:
This Pack Includes Simple Kind to Skin Cleansing Facial Wipes & Micellar Cleansing Wipes Combo - (25 Wipes + 25 Wipes) Here’s the best way to remove makeup. Simple Cleansing facial wipes are merciless on make-up, even waterproof mascara, but gentle on skin. With a super soft fabric, it is a gentle way to remove make up and impurities from skin, eyes and lips, whilst instantly refreshing skin. Our cleansing face wipes leave no residues and like all Simple products contains no colour or dye, no alcohol, no parabens, no mineral oil and no artificial perfume. We’re dermatologically tested and approved, and ophthalmologically tested. Specially designed for sensitive skin users, we’re tested and approved hypoallergenic and non-comedogenic. Along with the goodness of triple purified water they are enriched with Vitamin B5 and Vitamin E. An Easy on the go solution to keep your skin feeling clean and fresh all day.
Looking for gentle everyday wipes? Look no further than Simple Kind to Skin Micellar Cleansing Wipes. have combined the magic of Micellar, from our Cleansing Water, with our convenient wipes format. These facial wipes are gentle for everyday use, but effective enough to remove makeup (even waterproof mascara), oil and dirt build up. Our wipes cleanse your face easily, remove impurities, and tough makeup with just one wipe. They are made with skin-loving ingredients perfect for all skin types, including Vitamins B and E and triple purified water, our purest possible water that instantly puts hydration back to the skin. These wipes are gentler than soap-based cleansers so skin is not left feeling dry or tight. These innovative Makeup Remover Wipes like all Simple products contains no colour or dye, no alcohol, no parabens, no mineral oil and no artificial perfume. We’re dermatologically tested and approved, and ophthalmologically tested. Specially designed for sensitive skin users, we’re tested and approved hypoallergenic and non-comedogenic. Perfect for on the go, why not carry a spare pack of Simple® wipes in your bag?
At Simple, we’re all about Clean Beauty with 100% efficacy! And it’s really SIMPLE – no skin irritants, only skin loving ingredients as we know what we leave out of our products is just as important as what we put in! In fact, we only include ingredients that downright love your skin and respect its natural balance and build it further. Because all skin can be sensitive at times; pollution, stress, irritants, changing weather, lack of sleep and city living, there’s a million reasons why your skin can feel a little sensitive and need the extra care and kindness. And we believe Clean Beauty is Simple, even for sensitive skin!

Our lips have an amazing ability to experience heightened sensations, allowing us to feel the slightest of touch and sense the environment around us. However, unlike body skin, the skin on our lips does not naturally create its own moisture layer, leaving it susceptible to dryness and chapping. The New Vaseline Lip therapy Tins with Petrolatum jelly helps moisturize dry lips and keep them soft. The new iconic tin pack design fits to palm and is easy to carry in your handbags and pockets so that you can easily moisturize your lips on the go! The new Vaseline Lip Therapy tins are available in multiple variants: Original care- For healthy looking and soft lips every day! Cocoa butter- For healthy looking and glowing lips every day! Aloe- For healthy looking and Naturally soft lips every day! Grab your favourite Lip tin and say no to dry and chapped lips with Vaseline Lip therapy.

1. Open the lid.
2. Apply the product gently on your lips with your index finger
3. Get moisturized and healthy-looking lips with a natural, glossy shine on the go!

Why it works:
This double powered face wash is infused with 100% natural tea tree extract, known and loved for its skin-clearing powers. Combined with 2% salicylic acid – a dream ingredient for pimple-prone, oily skin that effortlessly clears clogged pores – this tea tree face wash works hard to deeply cleanse skin and suck out impurities.
Benefits:
With St. Ives Pimple Clear Face Wash, you can start your day feeling fresh and clean. It washes away up to 99.99% of those annoying pimple-causing germs and helps stop pimples from coming back. Plus, it’ll help get rid of the marks left behind after an eruption. This naturally derived, paraben free cleanser for oily skin has a refreshing green tea and citrus scent and a clean formula, so you can trust it with your skin.
How to use:
To use, splash your face with water, apply a small amount of this pimple face wash to your palm and massage it onto wet skin using circular motions. Focus on your pimple-prone areas, then rinse the cleanser with water. For best results, use morning and night.
Try this:
Let those pimples you mean business with this two-step pimple-busting routine. Follow your face wash with the St. Ives Pimple Clear Face Scrub to clear out clogged pores and the annoying marks and dry, uneven skin left behind by pimples. Use it a few times a week for gorgeously clear skin.
Globally, St. Ives does not test on animals and is PETA approved.

That’s why we’ve created Dove Deeply Nourishing Hand Wash.

Dove gently cleanses your skin while retaining its natural moisture rather than stripping it away like ordinary soaps, and in addition helps replenish nutrients that are lost during the cleansing process.
Just dispense a pump of this Dove Hand Wash into your hands and work into a rich lather before rinsing away.
Dove is pH neutral and has gentle cleansers.
It washes away germs and helps nourish and moisturize hands with every wash.
It is suitable for use on all skin types.
It is mild and hence suitable for dry and sensitive skin too.

With our new Simple Mini Micellar Cleansing Water you can keep your skin cleansed & happy wherever you are, wherever you go! Our travel-size micellar water contains micelles, clever cleansing bubbles which gently lift out make-up and impurities, unclogging pores and instantly boosting skins hydration by 90%. Simple Mini Micellar Cleansing Water unclogs pores, cleanses, and attracts dirt and impurities like a magnet without irritating the skin. Like all Simple products, this vegan micellar contains no colour or dye, no alcohol, no parabens, no mineral oil and no artificial perfume. We’re dermatologically tested and approved, and ophthalmologically tested. Specially designed for sensitive skin users, we’re tested and approved hypoallergenic and non-comedogenic. The special blend includes skin-loving ingredients, including Vitamins B3 and C and triple purified water, our purest possible water. We believe in continuously working to be kinder to the planet, so our Mini Micellar water is vegan and Simple is certified cruelty-free by PETA, we don’t test on animals anywhere in the world. Also these travel pouches are made with 62% less plastic compared to our other 50ml packs and can be squeezed until the last drop to reduce product waste. Win! At Simple, we’re all about Clean Beauty with 100% efficacy! And it’s really SIMPLE – no skin irritants, only skin loving ingredients as we know what we leave out of our products is just as important as what we put in! In fact, we only include ingredients that downright love your skin and respect its natural balance and build it further. Because all skin can be sensitive at times; pollution, stress, irritants, changing weather, lack of sleep and city living, there’s a million reasons why your skin can feel a little sensitive and need the extra care and kindness. And we believe Clean Beauty is Simple, even for sensitive skin!

descriptor.long_desc:
Launched in 1948, TRESemmé was named after renowned hair care expert Edna Emmé. Up until the 1950s, TRESemmé was sold only in salons. Today it is available at a shop near you, so that you can have salon-style hair at home. For over 60 years, TRESemmé has built a history of success in thirteen countries around the world. From its origins in 1947 and salon expertise, TRESemmé  has been driven by a simple truth: Every woman deserves to look and feel fabulous, like she has just stepped out of the salon, everyday. Driven by our salon heritage, we work with our stylists to deliver expert solutions from salon quality products without the salon price tag. Our salon inspired products enriched with high quality ingredients help you experience that salon feeling, everyday. This range has also been carefully selected for its advanced formula. TRESemmé Pro Protect Shampoo is the first sulphate-free variant, which is infused with the goodness of Moroccon Argan Oil. It is highly beneficial for people having coloured hair because it helps in retaining hair colour, along with lending a long-lasting vibrancy and shine to the hair. For best results use it with TRESemmé Pro Protect Conditioner.
Sulphate-free
Infused with the goodness of Moroccan Argan Oil
Suitable for coloured hair
Leaves hair with long-lasting vibrancy and shine
Using a good sulphate-free shampoo retains the hair colour
Cleans hair. Maintains your natural shine.

"TRESemmé Keratin Smooth Deep Smoothing Mask is a deeply nourishing hair treatment specially formulated to moisturise tresses while helping to control frizz for up to 3 days.* Part of the TRESemmé Keratin Smooth collection, this moisturising hair mask packs five smoothing benefits into one: fights frizz, detangles knots, boosts shine, adds softness and tames fly-aways. Use weekly for hair that’s silky smooth and full of natural movement. Keratin-enhanced formula. Keratin proteins are the natural building blocks of your hair, and work by smoothing down the hair cells, leaving strands stronger, smoother and easier to manage Enriched with marula oil. Known as Africa’s beauty secret, this fast-absorbing and ultra-lightweight oil seals the hair follicles for ultimate softness and shine Five benefits in one. Our professional formula is designed to fight frizz, detangle knots, boost shine, add softness and tame fly-away"
For the best results, start your routine with TRESemmé Keratin Smooth Frizz Control Shampoo
Once rinsed, remove excess water and apply a generous amount of TRESemmé Keratin Smooth Deep Smoothing Mask, distributing evenly through the hair, from the middle to the ends
Run a wide-tooth comb or your fingers through to smooth and detangle. Leave for 3–5 minutes
Use weekly, or whenever your hair needs a hydration hit.

descriptor.long_desc:
TRESemmé Keratin Smooth Hair Serum helps your hair restore its keratin leaving them visibly straight and smoother. Infused with the goodness of Camellia Oil, this professional serum nourishes each strand of your hair making them silky smooth and easier to manage. This unique combination of Keratin and Camellia Oil conditions and strengthen your hair and provides them hydration and elasticity. With its dual action, TRESemmé Keratin Smooth Hair Serum helps you get up to 100% smoother hair with more shine. When used together with the TRESemmé Keratin Smooth Shampoo and Conditioner, this nourishing system controls frizz for as long as upto 3 days. Recommended by professionals, the TRESemmé Keratin Smooth Hair Serum is especially formulated for Indian hair and is suitable for both naturally and chemically treated hair. It is also suitable for use in conjunction with any oil treatments. Suitable for both men and women. To use: Apply Keratin Smooth Shampoo to wet hair and gently massage to work into a lather. Rinse hair thoroughly. Follow with the TRESemmé Keratin Smooth conditioner for an extra boost of smoothness. Apply Tresemme Keratin Smooth Hair Serum to damp or dry hair evenly, avoiding roots. Now, get visibly straighter, smoother hair that is easier to style. Buy now to enjoy gorgeous, salon-quality smooth hair everyday without the salon price tag!
Our Professional quality formula with camellia oil, instantly control frizz and give your hair vibrancy and shine.
Tackles split ends, tames unruly hair and makes them a lot more manageable
It is suitable for both, natural as well as chemically treated hair
Camellia oil known to tame fizziness, makes your hair more manageable and adds long lasting vibrancy and shine
Keratin protein a natural protein that makes up most of your hair, it tackles dryness and controls damage
Camellia oil and keratin protein to give the power of keratin protein with the nourishing effects of camellia oil helps improve the overall quality of your tresses

To get best results; add your clothes in the machine and then pour half cap of power concentrate.
